1b1('bum): // shes rab kyakyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
1b2('bum): ban+d+ha pa/ 'am po brgya dang kya dgu pa/ gsol pa
1b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang de ltar rtogs pa ni/ byang chub
2a1('bum): // sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
2a2('bum): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin
2a3('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad
2a4('bum): du/ gang de ltar rtogs pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
2b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ga/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
2b2('bum): kyi phyi ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
2b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshu rol gyi 'gram 'am/ pha rol gyi/ 'gram 'am/ gnyis kyi dbus
2b4('bum): na mi gnas na de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bco ldan 'das
2b5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ 
3a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
3a2('bum): tshu rol gyi 'gram 'am/ pha rol gyi 'gram 'am/ gnyis ka'i dbus na mi gnas shing / shin tu rnam par dag
3a3('bum): pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dus pa/ sum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// 
3a4('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg papa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
3a5('bum): kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/ dmigs pa'i tshul du 'du shes su bgyid pa ni
3a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ba'o// bcom ldan 'das
3b1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor legs so legs so// rab 'byor de ni ming du yang chags pa yin// 
3b2('bum): mtshan mar yang chags pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na ming du yang chags shing / mtshan mar yang chags/ 
3b3('bum): pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems
3b4('bum): dpa'i theg pa ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyin pa la/ ming du 'dzin tam/ mtshan ma 'dzin na de ni/ shes rab kyi pha
3b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la ming dang mtshan mar 'dzin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog
3b6('bum): tu 'byin to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ngo // rab 'byor gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems
3b7('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan mar 'dzin cing / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan mar gzung nas/ shes
4a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed na/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed cing / shes rab
4a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ngo // rab 'byor
4a3('bum): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang de ltar legs par
4a4('bum): bshad cing / legs par bstan la/ chags pa dang ma chags pa de dag kyang mchis papo mtshar che'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
4a5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
4a6('bum): kyi chags pa ni gang yin ma chags pa ni gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
4a7('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshor ba stong pa
4b1('bum): zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'du shes stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'du byed stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya
4b2('bum): bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mig stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rna ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sna stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lce
4b3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lus stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// yid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar 'du/ 
4b4('bum): shes chags pa'o// sgra stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chag das pa'o// dri stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags dpa'o// ro stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// reg
4b5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// chos stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mig gis rnam bar shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 
4b6('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na
4b7('bum): chags pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes ni chags pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa stod
4b8('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lce'i 'dus
5a1('bum): / reg pa snong ba zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lus kyis 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// yid kyi su te / 
5a2('bum): bstong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyun gyis tshor ba
5a3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya ba
5a4('bum): 'du shes na chags pa'o// lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa na// 
5a5('bum): bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sa'i khams stong pa ni/ sa bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// chu'i khams/ stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// me'i
5a6('bum): khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rlung gi khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// namakha'i khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 
5a7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'i// ma rigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'du byed stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 
5a8('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// ming dang gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// skye mched drug stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// reg pa
5b1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sred pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// len pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ 
5b2('bum): chags pa'o// srid pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// skye ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rga shi stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
5b3('bum): phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa
5b4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na cha gus pa'o// bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
5b5('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// nang stong pa/ nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// phyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// phyin
5b6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// don dam/ 
5b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 
5b8('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyi stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya
6a1('bum): bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags/ 
6a2('bum): pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes
6a3('bum): bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dran pa nye
6a4('bum): pabar gzhag pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags ra ba'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
6a5('bum): na chags pa'o// dbang po rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes/ na chags pa'o// stobs rnams stong pa zhes bya bar/ 'du shes na chags pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
6a6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
6a7('bum): na chags pa'o// bsam gtan rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshad med pa rnams steng pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
6a8('bum): rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam par thar pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'dra
6b1('bum): shes na chags pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa zhes bya ba
6b2('bum): 'du shes na chags pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
6b3('bum): stobs rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mi 'jigs pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags
6b4('bum): pa'o// byams pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags dpa'o// snying rje chen po stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na cha dgas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong
6b5('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na
6b6('bum): chags pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rang byang chub stong pa zhes bya bar 'du
6b7('bum): shes na chags pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa
6b8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pa/ 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes na chags
7a1('bum): ra ma ngas pa tshas rnams pa mangs pamangs shes byubyu dugs namags da /  rgyu sa rnamasas su rgyas sa shes tu ba/ 
7a2('bum): shes nachags pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mi ngamigs pa'i tshul du sems dang pa bskyed panye bar bzung banas
7a3('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod nachags pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// brtson 'grus kyang rol tu
7a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol ba tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// nang stong pa zhid la spyong
7a5('bum): na chags pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// stong pa/ nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// chen po stong
7a6('bum): banyid la spyod na chags pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ 
7a7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'i/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa/ 
7a8('bum): nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags
7b1('bum): pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// dran pa
7b2('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// yang dag pa spong ba rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// dbang po rnams la spyod na chags
7b3('bum): pa'o// stobs rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod na chags pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa
7b4('bum): rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// bsam gtan rnams la spyod na de chags pa'o// tshad med pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod
7b5('bum): na chags pa'o// rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// mthar gyis gnas gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// rnam par thar
7b6('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod na chags pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// 
7b7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa
7b8('bum): rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// byams pa chen po la spyod na chags pa'o// snying rje chen po la spyod na chags pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod na chags pa'o// rgyun tu/ 
8a1('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o// 
8a2('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// rang byang chub la spyod na chags pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// 
8a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams kyi chags pa med pa gang zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
8a4('bum): bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzu dgas la gzugs shes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// tshor ba la
8a5('bum): tshor ba zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'du shes la 'dun sa shes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'du byed la 'du khyed ces bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rnam par shes pa la rnam
8a6('bum): par shes pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes pa
8a7('bum): med do// da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab
8a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di snyams du bdag gis sbyin bzhig sbyin no// 'di la sbyin pa zhig sbyin no// sbyin pa 'di lta bu zhig sbyin no// bdag gis ni tshul khrims shig bsrung ngo // 
8b1('bum): tshul khrims 'di lta bu nig bsrung bana'am/ bdag gis ni bzod pa zhig bsgom mo// bzod pa 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mona'am/ bdag gis ni brtson 'grus zhig brtsam mo// 
8b2('bum): brtson 'grus 'di lta bu zhig brtsam mo zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni bsam gtam la mnyam par gzhag go// bsam gtan 'di lta bu zhig la mnyam par gzhag go na 'am/ bad
8b3('bum): gis ni shes rab cig bsgom mo// shes rab 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni bsod nams zhig bskyed do// bsod nams 'di lta bu zhig bskyed // bsod/ 
8b4('bum): nams 'di tsam zhig bskyed do// bdag gi ni byang chusems dpar skyon med par chung bar bya'o// bdagadagis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o// bdag
8b5('bum): gis ni sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya/ 'o snyam du sems pa med de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha rad ti
8b6('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pasashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni rnam par rtog pa de lta bu thams cad nang stong pa nyid dang
8b7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma
8b8('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang
9a1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa
9a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang ngatshan stong pa nyid dang / dngos po me nga 'ang zanang slong ba nyid kyi phyir med cing mi rmyiste/ tshe dang ldan pa shar d+ha ti'i bu/ de dag byang chub sems
9a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chags pa med bdag ni/ de nas lha'i dbang po bai tu byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
9a4('bum): 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor nas dgrangs gang gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dpa'i rig kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags
9a5('bum): bar 'gyur ba yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i dbang po ba nal 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shika 'di la
9a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mos sems su 'du shes pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes
9a7('bum): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang
9a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / stong
9b1('bum): panyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus ma byas
9b2('bum): stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dong ba med pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 
9b3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
9b4('bum): du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du
9b5('bum): shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su 'du na/ pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams su 'du shes ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams su 'du shes pa
9b6('bum): dang / dbang po rnams su 'du shes pa dang / stobs rnams su 'du shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su 'du shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par 'du shes
9b7('bum): pa dang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / bsam gtan rnams su 'du shes pa dang / tshad med pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
9b8('bum): 'jug pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
10a1('bum): rdzus kyi rnarnams su 'jug / rab gshegs rnams su dgas padang / byag na
10a2('bum): rnams su 'dugs pa dang / byams pa chen por 'dushes pa dang /  chen por 'dugs pang / sangs rgya kyims ma 'dres pa co kyi rngu 'du shes pa/ 
10a3('bum): b+h+ya ma dang nga dag pa rjegs pa'i byang chub tu sangs sus/  / yongs su 'dugs pa na shi kyang rungs me pa than pa 'i dgas
10b1('bum): bsngo bar mi nus so// sna'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// lce'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// lus kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// yid
10b2('bum): kyi rang ba zhin yongs su bsdu bar mi nus so// gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// sgra'i rang banan yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rje'i rang bzhin
10b3('bum): yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// ra'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rig gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// chos kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo ba
10b4('bum): mi nus so// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rna ba'i rnam parashes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// 
10b5('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yo sa su bsngo bar mi nus so// lus kyi rnam par shes
10b6('bum): pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi
10b7('bum): nus so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang
10b8('bum): bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// miH/ 
11a1('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyi sa tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs
11a2('bum): su bsngo bar mi nus so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// lho'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi
11a3('bum): nus so lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar ma nus so// yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// 
11a4('bum): sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// / chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// / mo khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ 
11a5('bum): rlung gi khams kyi dang 'dzin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rnam pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su su nus so/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin mongs su bsngo bar ma
11a6('bum): nus sa/ mam pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar ma num sa/ 'du byed gyi nga nganan yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rnam pa gas pa'i rang bzhin yongs su brdza
11a7('bum): rnams mi dang gzugs kyi rang banan mangs su bsdu bar ma nus pa/ rgyam ched drug gi rang ben na mangs su marjo ba nus pa// pa pa mngamanas sa
11a8('bum): brjobar ma nus so/ ma ba'i rang bzhin yongs su rdzo bar ma dus sa/ sred pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngob ma du/ mam canan mas su
11b1('bum): nus so sring pa'i rang banan yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// skye ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar ma nus so// rga sha'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// sbyin
11b2('bum): ba'i pha rol tu ldan pa'i rang ban na yongs su sngobar ma nus so// tshul khrims kyi rob tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar ma nus so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
11b3('bum): bzhin yongs su bsngo bar ma nus so// brtson 'grus kyi ro sbyin pa rang bzhin dngas smra sngo bar mi nus pa/ bsam gtan gyi rol tu phyin pa'i rang banan tshangs su
11b4('bum): bar mi nus so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bzhin yongasu bsngo bar mi nus so// nang stong pa dpa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// 
11b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi nga bzhin 'angs su bsngo bar ma nus so// byin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mongs sa par ma nus so stong ba na stong pa nyid kyi nga bzhin yongs su bsngobar ma
11b6('bum): nus so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhi
11b7('bum): yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// 
11b8('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// dong ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
12a1('bum): yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bani/ 
12a2('bum): yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// 
12a3('bum): ning stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongasu bsngo bar mi nus so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin
12a4('bum): yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rdzu 'phrul dgyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// 
12a5('bum): dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bcwa
12a6('bum): bar mi nus so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// 
12a7('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
12a8('bum): rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nuso// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin yongs su
12b1('bum): bsngo bar mi nus so// rnam pa sar mam hA stong banyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang banan yongs su pardzob ma num sa/ mngon par
12b2('bum): shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin
12b3('bum): yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// mi 'jigs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo
12b4('bum): bar mi nus so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar nus so// byams rabu chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// 
12b5('bum): snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rgyun tu zhugs pa
12b6('bum): 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// lan cig phyir 'ong pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yong / 
12b7('bum): bsngo bar mi nus so// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongasu bsngo bar mi nus so// rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin yongasu bsngo bar mi nus so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
12b8('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
13a1('bum): sems dpa' chen pos/ gzhan zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan tam/ yang dag par bskul lam/ yang
13a2('bum): dag par spro ba bskyed dam/ yang dag par dga' bar bya na/ yang dag par rje su song ba'i yid kyis/ gzhan yang dag par bstan par bya'o// yang dge par bskul bar bya'o// 
13a3('bum): yang dag par spo ba bskyed par bya'o// yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o// de yang ci nas kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
13a4('bum): la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam
13a5('bum): par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / gzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 
13a6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
13a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
13a8('bum): phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod ba'i tshe/ bdag ni nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / byi ste
13b1('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid la spyong ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni byi nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par
13b2('bum): rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe
13b3('bum): bdag ni chen po stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod dongo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par
13b4('bum): mi 'gyur bar dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbadag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rtog/ dpar mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la
13b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod rdo/ zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni
13b6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
13b7('bum): nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba
13b8('bum): dang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
14a1('bum): bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyong ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong panyi
14a2('bum): la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dngos
14a3('bum): po me pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni ngo bo nyid
14a4('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
14a5('bum): nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya ba
14a6('bum): rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul
14a7('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dbang po
14a8('bum): rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni stobs rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / byang
14b1('bum): dru kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
14b2('bum): bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spong ba'i tshe/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa
14b3('bum): rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi
14b4('bum): 'gyur ba dang / tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i cha/ bdag ni tshad med pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / gzugs med
14b5('bum): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par
14b6('bum): thar pa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
14b7('bum): bdag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
14b8('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnam
15a1('bum): marung / bdag ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma spyong nga nas bya bar ma par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la stong pa'i cha/ bdag na/ 
15a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par mi 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod de zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi
15a3('bum): 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyong ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 
15a4('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyong pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mi 'ji dgas pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par/ mi 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la
15a5('bum): spyo pa'i tshe/ bdag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyurapa dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni
15a6('bum): byams pa chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni snying rje chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur
15a7('bum): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rgyun tu
15a8('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyong pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
15b1('bum): bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog mi 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyong ngo zhes bya/ 
15b2('bum): bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub la spyod
15b3('bum): pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang byang chub la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod do// 
15b4('bum): zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya ba rnam par
15b5('bum): rtog par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par bstan par bya'o// yang dag par bskul bar bya'o// yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
15b6('bum): rigs kyi bu mes gzhan bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bsten par bya'o// yang dag par bskul bar bya'o// yang dag par spro ba bskyeng bar bya'o// yang dag par
15b7('bum): dga' ba bskyed par bya'o// de yang dag par bstan pa de dang / yang dag par bskul ba de dang / yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya ba de dang / yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ba des
15b8('bum): gnan yang dag par ston cing / yang dag par bskul ba dang / yang dag par slob bskyed cing / yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i tshe/ rma 'thung bar mi 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyis gnang
16a1('bum): pa'i yang dag par bskul bas yang dag par bskul ba yin te/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongasu spangs pa yin no// 
16a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po brgya dgu bcu pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la leg so zhes bya
16a3('bum): ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dag ston pa legs so legs so// rab 'byor de bas na khyod la chags pa'i
16a4('bum): rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba dag bstan par byas/ de dag shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bstan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas/ tshe dang ldan
16a5('bum): pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to// bcom/ ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ bla na med
16a6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar yid la byed na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du
16a7('bum): mtshan mar gyur pa de srid du chags pa'o// gang yang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chags pa thams
16a8('bum): cad dang bral ba/ de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de thams cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing / yid la byas nas bla na med pa
16b1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de dag dang / de ma
16b2('bum): yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang mtshan mar byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngon/ rab 'byor ji tsam du
16b3('bum): mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba
16b4('bum): yang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams
16b5('bum): cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dben pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag/ 'tsha'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
16b6('bum): de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa ma byas/ mngon par 'du ma byas pa ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya bar mi nu so gsol pa/ bco ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mngon par
16b7('bum): sangs ma rgyas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te/ chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do// rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin / 
16b8('bum): gcig po gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no// gang rang bzhin ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o// gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par 'dum byas pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems
17a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi rang bzhin gcig go// rang bzhin ma yin pa ma byas pa/ mngon par 'dum byas pa shes na chags pa'i rnam pa thams cad
17a2('bum): yongasu spangs pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab
17a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong / mthos/ ma rtogs/ rnam par ma shes/ mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
17a4('bum): phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// bcom 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems kyis ma sheso// gzugs kyis ma shes so// tshor bas ma shes so// 
17a5('bum): 'du shes kyis ma shes so// 'du byed kyis mi shes so// rnam par shes pas ma shes so// mig gis ma shes/ so// rna bas ma shes so// snas ma shes so// lces ma/ 
17a6('bum): shes so// lus kyis ma shes so// yid kyis ma shes so// gzugs kyis ma shes so// sgras ma shes so// dris ma shes so// ros ma sheso// reg gis ma shes so// chos
17a7('bum): sa mashes so// migagis pa zhes pas na shes// rnaba'i ma byang shes pasam shes pa// shA'i rnam pa nas pas ma shes so// sno rnam pa bya shes pas mgos// lu
17a8('bum): rnam par shes pas ma shes so// yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma shes so// mig gi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma
17b1('bum): shes so// lce'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so// rnga ba'i
17b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
17b3('bum): rkyen kyis tshor bas ma shes so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bsam shes so// sa'i khams kyis ma shes so// chu'i khams kyis ma shes so// me'i khams kyis ma shes/ 
17b4('bum): rlung gi khams kyis ma sheso// na mkha'i khams kyis ma sheso// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma shes so// ma rig ngas pas ma shes so// 'du byed kyis ma shes so// rnam
17b5('bum): par shes pas ma shes so// ming dang gzugs kyis ma sheso// skye mched drug gis ma shes so// reg pas ma sheso// tsher bas ma shes so// sred pas ma shes so// len pas
17b6('bum): ma shes so// srid pas ma shes so// skye bas ma sheso// rga shes ma shes so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma sheso// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// bzod pa'i pha rol
17b7('bum): tu phyin pas ma shes so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so// nang stong pa nyid
17b8('bum): kyis ma shes so// phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// don dam
18a1('bum): pastong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis/ 
18a2('bum): ma shes so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma sheso// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma sheso// 
18a3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// mi dmigs stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// dngos po
18a4('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma sheso// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma sheso// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis ma sheso// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma sheso// dbang po rnams kyis
18a5('bum): ma shes so// stobs rnams kyis ma shes so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma shes so// 'phags pa/ 'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma shes so// 'phags pa'i
18a6('bum): bden pa rnams kyis ma shes so// bsam gtan rnams kyis ma shes so// tshad med pa rnams kyis ma shes so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma sheso// rnam par / 
18a7('bum): brgyad kyis ma shes so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma shes so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas ma shes so// mngon
18a8('bum): par shes pa rnams kyis ma shes so// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma shes so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus ma shes so// mi 'jigs pa rnams
18b1('bum): kyis ma shes so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis ma shes so// byams pa chen pos ma shes so// snying rje chen pos ma shes so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma shes/ 
18b2('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma shes so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma shes so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma shes so// dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma shes so// rang byang chub
18b3('bum): kyis ma shes so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma shes so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u nyi shu
18b4('bum): brgyang ngo // // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan da'adas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes
18b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyid pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs
18b6('bum): mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'du shes mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / mig mi dmigs pa dang / 
18b7('bum): rna ba mi dmigs pa dang / sna mi dmigs pa dang / lce mi dmigs pa dang / lus mi dmigs pa dang / yid mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa dang / sgra mi dmigs pa dang / 
18b8('bum): dri mi dmigs pa dang / ro mi dmigs pa dang / reg mi dmigs pa dang / chos mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi
19a1('bum): dmigs pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyis rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / yid/ 
19a2('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang
19a3('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi
19a4('bum): dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i da tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pad las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i 'dus te/ 
19a5('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bami dmigs pa dang / lus kyi 'du sa te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dngayid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher mi dmigs pad
19a6('bum): sa'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / chu'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / me'i kham mi dmigs pa dang / rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa dang / nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs
19a7('bum): pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / ma rig pa mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / ming dang
19a8('bum): gzugs mi dmigs pa dang / skye mched drug mi dmigs pa dang / reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa dang / len pa mi dmigs pa dang / 
19b1('bum): srid pa mi dmigs pa dang / skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rga shi mi dmigs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / bzod
19b2('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
19b3('bum): mi dmigs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / 
19b4('bum): chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / don dam pa stong/ pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs
19b5('bum): pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/ ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmi gas pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang
19b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs
19b7('bum): pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag
19b8('bum): pa mi dmigs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba mi dmigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mi dmigs pa dang / dbang po mi dmigs pa dang / stobs mi dmigs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
20a1('bum): mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan mi dmigs pa
20a2('bum): dang / tshang med pa mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad mi dmigs pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
20a3('bum): dgu mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin mi dmigs
20a4('bum): pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin gshe dgas pa'i stobs mi dmigs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa mi dngamigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mi dmigs
20a5('bum): pa dang / byams pa chen po mi dmigs pa dang / snying rje chen lo mi dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mi dmigs pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
20a6('bum): bu mi dmigs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rang byang chub mi dmigs/ 
20a7('bum): pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
20a8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rnam pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
20b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya brdzi spyod na/ 
20b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngo // gal te gzugs bdag
20b3('bum): ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
20b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am/ 
20b5('bum): mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs med do// gal te// tshor ba la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ la spyod do// gal te tshor brtag ces bya ba 'am/ 
20b6('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ bsdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
20b7('bum): spyod do// gal te tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi/ 
20b8('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa
21a1('bum): 'am sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba med do// gal te 'du shes la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du she/ 
21a2('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
21a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes sdug
21a4('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am/ miN+Da dag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag
21a5('bum): gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lto bu'i 'du shes med do// gal te 'du byed la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te
21a6('bum): 'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ 
21a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed
21a8('bum): sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal
21b1('bum): ba'am bdag gam/ bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'du byed med do// gal te rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
21b2('bum): la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ 
21b3('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
21b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa sdu dag ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir/ 
21b5('bum): zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'gro/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'i ma/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par
21b6('bum): shes pa med do// gal te mig la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
21b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig bde nas bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig bdag ces bya ba 'am/ 
21b8('bum): bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
22a1('bum): da //  tson phyir zhen/ klubyu ga pa'ang/ mi ga sa/ bde ts+tsha/ sdug bsngal pa 4/ bdag gas padag med pa'ang/ spyug/ 
22a2('bum): 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mig med do// gal te rna ba la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna brtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ 
22a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ 
22a4('bum): bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngal spyod do// gal te rna ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug/ ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
22a5('bum): spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa/ 'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur
22a6('bum): bde lta bu'i rna ba med do// gal te sna la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
22a7('bum): phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar
22a8('bum): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
22b1('bum): rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna med do// gal te lce la mi spyod na/ shes rab
22b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya
22b3('bum): par mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce
22b4('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug
22b5('bum): bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa// 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lce med do// gal/ te lus la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
22b6('bum): la spyod do// gal te lus rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na
22b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus bdag ces bya ba 'amabadag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus sdug ces bya
22b8('bum): ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag
23a1('bum): gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus med do// gal te yid la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
23a2('bum): gal te yid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
23a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid sdug ces bya ba
23a4('bum): 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol ra tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ 
23a5('bum): bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par/ 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid med do// gal te gzug sa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
23a6('bum): gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na
23a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs sdug ces
23a8('bum): bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag
23b1('bum): med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs med do// gal te sgra la mi stong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal spyod do// gal te sgra rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces/ 
23b2('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sgra bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sgra
23b3('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sgra sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
23b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par
23b5('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra med do// gal te dril mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dri rtag tse sa bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi
23b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dri bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dri ba dag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces
23b7('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dri sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
23b8('bum): gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dri med do// gal te ro la mi spyod/ 
24a1('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ro rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal spyod do// gal to/ 
24a2('bum): bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ro bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
24a3('bum): pal spyod do// gal te ro sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba
24a4('bum): 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am// sdug dpa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ro med do// gal tre reg la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ 
24a5('bum): gal te reg rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal/ te reg bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
24a6('bum): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rog bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// gal te reg
24a7('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba
24a8('bum): 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i reg med do// gal te chos la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos rtag ces
24b1('bum): bya bar 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
24b2('bum): la spyod do// gal te chos bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar
24b3('bum): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ 
24b4('bum): sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos medo// gal tre mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi rnam par
24b5('bum): shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal
24b6('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod // gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
24b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod// gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag
24b8('bum): pa'am mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa med do// gal te rna ba'i
25a1('bum): rnam par shes pa la spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes brtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes/ 
25a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngo do// gal te rna ba'i rnam pa
25a3('bum): shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ 
25a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ 
25a5('bum): mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/ shes ra/ ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes
25a6('bum): brtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngo // gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ 
25a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam
25a8('bum): par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba 'am/ 
25b1('bum): sdug bsngam pa'am/ bdag gas/ bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu gA'i rnam par shes pa med do// gas te lce rnam pa shes baspyod na/ shes rab/ 
25b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rnam par
25b3('bum): shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar
25b4('bum): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal tre lce'i rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
25b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bad ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gamabadag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba/ 
25b6('bum): de lta bu'i lce'i rnam par shes pa med do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyang ngo // gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ 
25b7('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
25b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam
26a1('bum): pa shes bsdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// datso bye zhen/ gang rtag
26a2('bum): 'am mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa med do// 
26a3('bum): gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtog ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
26a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam pa shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba/ mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
26a5('bum): gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yod kyi rnam par shes pa
26a6('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa'am bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba
26a7('bum): 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa med do// gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi
26a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi 'dus te reg ba rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi smod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ngo // gal te mig gi 'du
26b1('bum): te reg pa 'di zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med/ 
26b2('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
26b3('bum): pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug
26b4('bum): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa med do// gal tre rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
26b5('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal
26b6('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
26b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am/ 
26b8('bum): mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med do// gal te sna'i 'dus te/ 
27a1('bum): reg pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg brtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes/ 
27a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa
27a3('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
27a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ra ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa'am/ 
27a5('bum): mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa med do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg
27a6('bum): pabartag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ 
27a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus
27a8('bum): te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba'am sdug
27b1('bum): bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa med do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod na/ shes
27b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ngo // gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngo do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
27b3('bum): bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes/ 
27b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te/ dag pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir na na/ 
27b5('bum): gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsnga/ la ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus kyi 'dus te
27b6('bum): reg pa med do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar ma
27b7('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
27b8('bum): te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug
28a1('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal / 
28a2('bum): 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med do// gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la mi spyod na/ 
28a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te
28a4('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba la dam/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes ra dab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi 'dus
28a5('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung
28a6('bum): ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ 
28a7('bum): sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te
28a8('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi
28b1('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
28b2('bum): phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i
28b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa
28b4('bum): 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur da ba de lta bu'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med do// 
28b5('bum): gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am// 
28b6('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
28b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
28b8('bum): te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am/ 
29a1('bum): mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag me pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba lta bu'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba
29a2('bum): tshor ba med do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ 
29a3('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
29a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te/ reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
29a5('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung / ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya ba/ ra mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
29a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa'am/ mi sdug par 'gyur ba/ 
29a7('bum): de lta bu'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus
29a8('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher
29b1('bum): ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag me/ 
29b2('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
29b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa
29b4('bum): 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la das byung ba'i tshor ba med do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg dpa las byung ba'i tshor ba la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
