54b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te nang stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid
54b4('bum): yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de nang stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te phyi stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs so zhes
54b5('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya bar de ltar yang mi
54b6('bum): spyodan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyang // gal ta byi nang stong pa nyid yong su ma rtogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong // ji ci'i phyir zhen
54b7('bum): byi nang stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs
54b8('bum): ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pade/ stong pa nyid stong
55a1('bum): nyid ma yin no nas bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chen po stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar
55a2('bum): spyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chen po stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang ma
55a3('bum): spyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
55a4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de don dam dpa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus
55a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs pa gang
55a6('bum): yin pa de 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na// 
55a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ 
55a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha'
55b1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thog ma dang
55b2('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa
55b3('bum): de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ 
55b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ 
55b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rang bzhi na stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
55b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos thams cad
55b7('bum): stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de chos thams
55b8('bum): cad stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyis
56a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma
56a2('bum): yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
56a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
56a4('bum): gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bdar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongasu ma
56a5('bum): rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma mi na no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
56a6('bum): yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
56a7('bum): ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
56a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ 
56b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yong su ma rdzog so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa nye bar
56b2('bum): gzhag pa rnams yong su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams
56b3('bum): yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yong su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de yang dag par spong ba rnams ma
56b4('bum): yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tudaphyin pa la spyod do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yo dang su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
56b5('bum): byin pa la spyong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi dang pa mas yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin bde rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes
56b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dbang po rnams yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po rnams yongs su ma
56b7('bum): rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dbang po rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te stobs rnams yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na
56b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stobs rnams yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ stobs rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
57a1('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub
57a2('bum): kyi yan lag rnams yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
57a3('bum): yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
57a4('bum): lag brgyad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab dkyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i bden dpa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab
57a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi
57a6('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan rnams yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam
57a7('bum): gtan rnams yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ bsam gtan rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshad med pa rnams yongasu ma rdzogs / 
57a8('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshad med pa rnams yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de tshad med pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang
57b1('bum): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
57b2('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yong su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes
57b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa brgyad
57b4('bum): yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yi dan no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na// shes rab kyi pha ro/ dal tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mthar gyi gnas pa'i
57b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de tsam phyir zhe na/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
57b6('bum): yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thar pa'i
57b7('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
57b8('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi
58a1('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod ma/ shes sa kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
58a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
58a3('bum): gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ ting nge
58a4('bum): 'dzin rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
58a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod ma/ 
58a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
58a7('bum): stobs bcu rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mi 'jigs
58a8('bum): pa bzhi yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi 'jigs rnams yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no zhes
58b1('bum): bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
58b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yong su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
58b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod do// gal te byams pa chen po yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams pa chen po yongs su
58b4('bum): ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ byams pa chen po ma yin no zhes byang de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ngo // gal te snying rje chen po yong su ma rdzogs so zhes
58b5('bum): byabar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ snying rje chen po ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar
58b6('bum): yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
58b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yong su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
58b8('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su
59a1('bum): ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lam
59a2('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de
59a3('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ 
59a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin bde/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no zhes
59a5('bum): bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar de/ bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
59a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang / ma chags pa legs par bstan pa 'di ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'
59a7('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
59a8('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang / ma chags pa legs par bstan to// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
59b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe / gal te gzugs chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshor ba chags
59b2('bum): pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'du shes chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes
59b3('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'du byed chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
59b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te rnam par shes pa chags nga pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab
59b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mig chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
59b6('bum): byiphyin pa la spyod do// nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes
59b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te sna chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
59b8('bum): pa'i tshe gal te lce chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te lus
60a1('bum): chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha
60a2('bum): gal te yid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs chags
60a3('bum): pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sgra chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes
60a4('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dri chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na
60a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal teraro chags pa/ 'amam chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
60a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te reg chags pa'am/ ma chags po zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
60a7('bum): spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te chos chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha
60a8('bum): rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
60b1('bum): byin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal tan pa'i rnam par shes pa chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyanganashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
60b2('bum): laspyod pa'i tsho/ gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
60b3('bum): pa'i tshe/ gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
60b4('bum): gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa da la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
60b5('bum): gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ ma chag sa pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
60b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
60b7('bum): gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sna'i
60b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa
61a1('bum): chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
61a2('bum): gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te
61a3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mig gi
61a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am/ ma chag ngas pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
61a5('bum): gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
61a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
61a7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
61a8('bum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor 'chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
61b1('bum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
61b2('bum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sa'i khams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi ba tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal
61b3('bum): te chu'i khams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te me'i khams chags pa 'am/ 
61b4('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'itshe/ gal te rlung gi khams chags pa 'am/ ma chags
61b5('bum): pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshegal te na mkha'i khams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa
61b6('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar
61b7('bum): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ma rig pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi
61b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'du byed chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
62a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha// gal te rnam par shes pa chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
62a2('bum): pal spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ming dang gzugs chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes
62a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te skye mched drug chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
62a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te reg pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags dpa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinadal spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
62a5('bum): gal te tshor ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sred
62a6('bum): bachags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te len pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags
62a7('bum): pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gal te srid pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
62a8('bum): rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te skye ba chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi srungs
62b1('bum): nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la srung pa cha/ gal te na shi chags pa'am/ mchags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
62b2('bum): pa'i tshe/ gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'itshe/ gal
62b3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bzod
62b4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya ba/ mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te brtsom
62b5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhe sa bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal
62b6('bum): te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te shes rab kyi
62b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te nang stong pa nyid chags pa
62b8('bum): 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te phyi stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes
63a1('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid chags pa'am
63a2('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes
63a3('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chen po stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
63a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpal spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi
63a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
63a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
63a7('bum): spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed pa'i tshe/ gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
63a8('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes
63b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dong ba med pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
63b2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
63b3('bum): gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te rang
63b4('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes dbya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te
63b5('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te
63b6('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ngo bo nyid stong
63b7('bum): pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid chags pa'am/ 
63b8('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags
64a1('bum): pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams
64a2('bum): chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams chags pa'am/ 
64a3('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dbang po rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes
64a4('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te stobs rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes
64a5('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes
64a6('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa
64a7('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar
64a8('bum): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bsam gtan rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ 
64b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gal te tshad med pa rnams chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab tu
64b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod
64b3('bum): na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
64b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha ro/ dal tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mthar gyis gan das pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu chags pa 'am/ ma chag
64b5('bum): pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
64b6('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
64b7('bum): gal te mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te/ 
64b8('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te gzungs kyi sgo
65a1('bum): rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
65a2('bum): gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal
65a3('bum): te mi 'jigs pa bzhi chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te so so yang dag par
65a4('bum): rig pa bzhi chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na nga/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te byams pa chen po
65a5('bum): chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te snying rje chen po
65a6('bum): chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
65a7('bum): brgyad chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te thams cad shes pa nyid
65a8('bum): chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lam gyis rnam pa shes pa nyid chags
65b1('bum): pa'amar mchags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ngo do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa'am/ ma chags pa
65b2('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ gzugs chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
65b3('bum): pa med do// tshor ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'du shes chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'du byed chags pa 'am
65b4('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa medo// mig chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
65b5('bum): pa med do// rna ba chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'a/ du shes pa med do// sna chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lce chags pa 'am/ ma chag
65b6('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lus chags pa 'am/ mi tshogs pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// yid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// gzugs
65b7('bum): chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// sgra chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// dri chags pa 'am/ ma chags
65b8('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// ro chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// reg chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 
66a1('bum): chos chags pa'am/ mchags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa me // rig gi rnam par shes pa chags pa'am/ mchags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes/ 
66a2('bum): pa med do// rna nga'i rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
66a3('bum): pa med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
66a4('bum): pa med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ dam chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes med do// mig dgi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa
66a5('bum): zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa/ chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du she/ sa pa med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa'am/ 
66a6('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lce'i 'dus te rog pa chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa chags pa'am/ ma
66a7('bum): chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags
66a8('bum): pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// sna'i 'dus te
66b1('bum): ris pa las byung ba 'tshar ba chags pa 'ju/ mchags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// blo'i 'dus te dag pa las byung nga'i tshor ba chags pa'am/ mchags pa zhes bya bar du
66b2('bum): shes pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bye bar 'jushes pa 'ing ngo // yid kyi la su te ga pa las byung ba'i tshing 'a chags
66b3('bum): pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// sa'i khams chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes byab 'du shes pa med do// tshul khams chags pa'am/ mchags
66b4('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mi'i khams chags pa 'am/ mchags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rlung gi khams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya
66b5('bum): bar 'du shes pa med do// rnam pa'i khams chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa meng ngo //  shes pa'i khams chags pa'am/ ma chags pa
66b6('bum): zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// ma rig pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'du byed chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
66b7('bum): pa med do// rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// ming dang gzugs chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa
66b8('bum): ming ngo // skye mched dru chags pa'am/ mchags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// reg pa chags pa'am/ mchags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// tshor bachags pa
67a1('bum): 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// sred pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// len pa chags pa'am/ 
67a2('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// srid pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// skye ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 
67a3('bum): rga shi chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
67a4('bum): phyin pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa me da // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// brtson
67a5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes/ bya bar 'du shes pa med do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du
67a6('bum): shes pa med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// nang stong pa nyid chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa
67a7('bum): med do// phyi stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// stong pa nyid stong
67a8('bum): pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// chen po stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// don dam pa stong pa nyid chags pa
67b1('bum): 'amangam chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags
67b2('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ 
67b3('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya ba 'du shes pa med do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes
67b4('bum): bya bar 'du shes pa med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid chagadas pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am
67b5('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mi dmigs pa/ stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
67b6('bum): chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
67b7('bum): chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams
67b8('bum): chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// dbang po rnams chags
68a1('bum): pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// stobs rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// byang chub kyi
68a2('bum): yan lag rnams chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 'phags
68a3('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// bsam gtan rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// tshad med pa
68a4('bum): rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa/ 
68a5('bum): med do// rnam par thar pa brgyad chags pa 'am/ ma cha gas pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mthar gyis/ gnas pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa dgu chags pa 'am/ ma chags/ 
68a6('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mngon
68a7('bum): par shes pa rnams chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// ting nge 'dzi rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// gzungs kyi sgo
68a8('bum): rnams chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// mi 'jigs
68b1('bum): bzhi chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// byams pa chen po chags
68b2('bum): chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// snying rje chen po chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
68b3('bum): chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes med do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
68b4('bum): 'bras bu chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chags dpa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 
68b5('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// rang byang chub chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// 
68b6('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs
68b7('bum): su mi 'grib ma bstan kyang yongasu mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi 'phel ma bstan kyang mi 'phel ba ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// rab 'byor
68b8('bum): de de bzhin te/ chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongasu mi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi 'phel/ ma bstan kyang mi 'phel lo// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ 
69a1('bum): dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing nam mkha'i legs pa 'am/ 
69a2('bum): legs pa brjod kyang / nam mkha' la ni legs pa brjod pas yongs su 'phel ba med do// nyes pa brjod pas yongasu 'grib pa med do// nam mkha' la ni legs pa brjod
69a3('bum): kyang chags pa med do// nyes pa brjod kyang khong khro ba med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do// nyes pa brjod kyang yongasasu 'grib
69a4('bum): pa med do// legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba med do// nyes pa brjod kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba med do// / rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pade
69a5('bum): bstan kyang de bzhin ma bstan kyang de bzhin no// gas la pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 
69a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i tshe/ zhum pa dang g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson par bgyid cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
69a7('bum): byang chub las slar mi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o// de ci'i sla du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
69a8('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom pa ste/ nam mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// 'du shes ma mchis so// 'du byed ma mchis so// rnam par
69b1('bum): shes pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni mig ma mchis so// rnab ma mchis so// sna ma mchis so// lce ma mchis so// lus ma mchis so// yid ma mchis so// nam
69b2('bum): mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis so// sgra ma mchis so// dri ma mchis so// ro ma mchis so// reg ma mchis so// chos ma mchis so// namakha' la ni mig gi rnam par shes
69b3('bum): pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma mchiso// sna'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ma mchiso// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// yid
69b4('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma mchiso// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma dmachis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// lce'i
69b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa ma mchi so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchi sa so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
69b6('bum): ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// 
69b7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni sa'i khams ma mchis so// chu'i khams
69b8('bum): ma mchis so// me'i khams ma mchis so// rlung gi khams ma mchis so// nam mkha'i khams ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis so// nam mkha' la
70a1('bum): ni ma rig pa ma mchis so// 'du byed ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// ming dang gzugs ma mchis so// skye mched drug ma mchis so// 
70a2('bum): reg pa ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// sred pa ma mchis so// len pa ma mchis so// srid pa ma mchi so// skye ba ma mchis so// rga shi ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni
70a3('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// 
70a4('bum): bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so// phyi stong pa nyid mchis
70a5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// chen po stong pa nyid ma mchis so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// 'dus byas stong
70a6('bum): pa nyid ma mchis so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma mchi so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma mchiso// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/ 
70a7('bum): ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// 
70a8('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma
70b1('bum): mchis so// yang dag par spong ba rnams ma mchis so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma mchis so// dbang po rnams ma mchis so// stobs rnams ma mchis so// byang chub kyi yan lag
70b2('bum): rnams ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis so// bsam gtan rnams ma mchiso// tshad med pa rnams ma mchis// 
70b3('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa brgyad ma mchis so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo
70b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med dam dmachis so// mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so// gting nge 'dzin rnams ma mchis so// gzungs kyi sgo
70b5('bum): rnams ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni de bzhin gshes sa pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis so// mi 'jigs pa ngan ma mchis so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma
70b6('bum): mchis so// byams pa chen po ma mchis so// snying rje chen po ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
70b7('bum): ma mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// dgra bcom pa nyid ma mchi so// rang byang chub ma mchis so// bla na med pa yang dag
70b8('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgya go gsum pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
71a1('bum): chen po gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'i don du brtson par mos/ 
71a2('bum): 'bad par mos/ rtsol bar mos pa dag ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can rnams kyi slad du/ go cha 'tshal pa de dag ni nam mkha' yongasu smin par 'tshal zhing yongs su grol bar 'tshal
71a3('bum): ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams
71a4('bum): kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la gdeg par 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi sladadu
71a5('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par/ zhugs pa de dag ni brtson 'grus chen po thob pa'o// bco ma ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
71a6('bum): gang sems can rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
71a7('bum): gang na mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni dpa' bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa ma mchis
71a8('bum): pa'i go cha 'tshal ba'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyis khams 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal
71b1('bum): lam bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ smig ma'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongasu gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa
71b2('bum): de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res/ sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das kyang
71b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am 'gang bar mi gda'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ de bzhin du gal te/ 
71b4('bum): phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dam bu'i tshal da lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal
71b5('bum): lam/ smig ma'i tshal lam 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang / bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal
71b6('bum): pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa yongasu mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gyi khams la
71b7('bum): 'grib pa 'am/ 'gang bar mi gda'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ bdag 'di skad
71b8('bum): du sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ nam mkha' yongs su smin par bgyi bar 'tshal zhing
72a1('bum): yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba lags shes mchi'o// de nas dge slong gcig cig 'di snyam du gyur te/ gang la chos gang yang skye ba dang / 'gag pa yang med
72a2('bum): la/ tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yang yod/ shes rab kyi phung po yang yod/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po yang yod/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong
72a3('bum): ba'i phung po yang yodargyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang yod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang yod/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang yod/ rang byang
72a4('bum): chub kyang yod/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nga chub kyang yod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa yang yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang yod/ phyir mi 'ong ba yang yod/ 
72a5('bum): dgra bcom pa yang yod/ rang sangs rgyas kyang yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog
72a6('bum): kyang yod/ chos dkon mchog kyang yod/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yang yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshalo
72a7('bum): snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi
72a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yod na/ gang la brtson par byed pa yin rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par
72b1('bum): sems pa de ni na mkha' stong pa nyid la brtson pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
72b2('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / 
72b3('bum): bskyab pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka khyod
72b4('bum): kyis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya ba'i rang chos de lta bu yang dag par rje su mthong ngam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskung
72b5('bum): bdang / bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rje su ma mthu ngo // rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka ga te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ji skad du bstan pa'i
72b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par 'gyur ro// gal te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na/ 
72b7('bum): de la mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// gang ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi mo
72b8('bum): de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o// ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / 
73a1('bum): bskyab par gang sems pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang / bsrung ba dang / bskyab par sems pa ste/ de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal pa
73a2('bum): can du 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems khyod kyis sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra rnyan dang / mig yor dang / sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / 
73a3('bum): bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
73a4('bum): pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab dpar gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ 
73a5('bum): khyod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bsgrub par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor
73a6('bum): de ni mi nus so// smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang
73a7('bum): sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin/ 
73a8('bum): nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// smras pa/ 
73b1('bum): ko'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing
73b2('bum): dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa'
73b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rmi lam lta bu'i chos dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yer lta bu dang / sprul
73b4('bum): pa lta bu'i chos rnams yongasu shes pa dang / de ltar yongasu shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems
73b5('bum): su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom semasu mi byed/ sgyu ma/ rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu rlom
73b6('bum): sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom
73b7('bum): sems su mi byed/ mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa rlom semasu mi byed/ sprul pas
73b8('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
74a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom
74a2('bum): sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi
74a3('bum): byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi
74a4('bum): byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do// de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa/ 
74a5('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// ko'u shi ka ga la/ te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
74a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba rlom sems su mi byed/ tshor bas rlom sems su mi byed/ tshor ba la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam
74a7('bum): gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ de sbru ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sbrums rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed // de sdig tu rlom
74a8('bum): sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rdul rlom sems su mi byed do// de sla brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la
74b1('bum): rlom sems su med do// de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul
74b2('bum): pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes
74b3('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ 'du shes kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ 'du shes la rlom semasu mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam
74b4('bum): la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi
74b5('bum): byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rI ma semasu mi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan
74b6('bum): la rlom sems su mi byed/ de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed
74b7('bum): sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed
74b8('bum): rlom sems su mi byed 'du byed kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ 'du byed la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ 
75a1('bum): rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed do// de sbrum rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyums rlom sems su mi byed/ sbru ma la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sdi/ 
75a2('bum): rgyu rlom sems su mi byed sdig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed sdig rgyul rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed / smra brnam
75a3('bum): lirlom sems su mi byed do// demig yod rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ 
75a4('bum): sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' nga sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
75a5('bum): rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes bas rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed na/ rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ 
75a6('bum): lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom
75a7('bum): sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgra brnyani rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom

75b2('bum): sumi byed/ mig gis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de skyil ma rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems
75b3('bum): su mi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyums rlom sems su ma byeng / sbrum la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sdig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/

75b5('bum): sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su/ mi byed mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems
75b6('bum): su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba rlom sems su
75b7('bum): mi byed/ rna bas rlom sems su mi byed/ rna ba la rlom sems su mi byed nade rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byon
75b8('bum): de sgyum rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la
76a1('bum): rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do// 
76a2('bum): de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su/ 
76a3('bum): mi byed/ sprul rlom sems su mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ sna rlom sems su
76a4('bum): mi byed/ snas rlom sems su mi byed/ sna la rlom sa mas su mi byed na de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byedarmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom

76a6('bum): rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed de// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi
76a7('bum): byed do// de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom semasu mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas
76a8('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lce rlom sems sa
76b1('bum): mi byed/ lces rlob sems su mi byed/ lce la rlom sems su mi byed do// de rmi la ma rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// 
76b2('bum): de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyum la rlom sems su mi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyul

76b5('bum): rlom sems su mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang chu/ ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus rlom sems su mi byed/

76b7('bum): mi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems
76b8('bum): mi byed/ smig rgyu'i rlom sems su mi byed do// de smra brlan rlom semasu mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sla brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do// dedamig yor rlom
77a1('bum): sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ 
77a2('bum): sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yid
77a3('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ yid kyis rlom semasu mi byed/ yid la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi
77a4('bum): lam la rlom semasu mi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems dasu mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma dal rlom sems su mi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems
77a5('bum): su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sem sa su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed// 
77a6('bum): sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do// de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom
77a7('bum): sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
77a8('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs la rlom semasu mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam
77b1('bum): gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom semasu mi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyums rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do// de smig rgyu
77b2('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed
77b3('bum): sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do// de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa
77b4('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// dko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
77b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sgra rlom sems su mi byed/ sgras rlom semasu mi byed/ sgra la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom
77b6('bum): sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgyu ma sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom
77b7('bum): sems su mi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed
77b8('bum): sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do// de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems
78a1('bum): su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rom semasu mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang
78a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dri rlom sems su mi byed/ dris rlom sems su mi byed/ dri la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam/ 
78a3('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom
78a4('bum): sems su mi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su
78a5('bum): mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnya na la rlom sems su mi byed do// de mig yor rloms mas su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ 
78a6('bum): mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang
78a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ro rlom sems su mi byed/ ros rlom sems su mi byed/ ro la rlom sems su mi byed na// 
78a8('bum): dermi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la
78b1('bum): rlo sems su ma byung ngo // de drug tu rlom sems sum byeng / sdig dus rlom sems su ba byed/ smig dul rlom sems sum byeng // ngasgra brnyan rlom sems su ma byeng / sgra brnyan gyi
78b2('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do// de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom
78b3('bum): sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
78b4('bum): reg rlom sems su mi byed/ reg gis rlom sems su mi byed/  reg la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la
78b5('bum): rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ 
78b6('bum): rlig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rdul rlom sems su mi byed // de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed de//

79a1('bum): sems su mi byed/ chos la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom semasu mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la

79a5('bum): la rlom sems su mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig gi rnam par shes pa rlom sems
79a6('bum): su mi byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom

79b2('bum): rlom semasu mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom semasu mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rlom

79b6('bum): rlom semasu mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom semasu mi byed/ mig yor la rlom semasu mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom semasu mi byed/ sprul pas rlom semasu mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom semasu mi byed do//

81a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig gis 'dus te reg pa rlom sems mi byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pas rlom semasu mi byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rlom semasu mi byed na/ de rmi lam

81a6('bum): rlom semasu mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom semasu mi byed do// ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rlom
