220a6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi
220a7('bum): panyid gang yin pa de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no// chos thams
220a8('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyi bab pa nyid gang len 'dzin chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma min no// rang namatshan nyid myong band kyi zabapa zhing gang yin mdzin rang gim tshan cid gyung
220b1('bum): nyid ma yin no// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin ba den dngos
220b2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin/ 
220b3('bum): bde ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no// yang dag pa
220b4('bum): spong ba rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag/ par spong ba rnams ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
220b5('bum): pa rnams ma yin no// dbang po rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnams ma yin no// stobs rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ stobs
220b6('bum): rnams ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i zab pa
220b7('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no// 
220b8('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa den bsam gtan rnams ma yin// chad med pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chang med pa rnams ma yin no// 
221a1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa den gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// rnam
221a2('bum): par thar pa brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin bden rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mtha
221a3('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 
221a4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni
221a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no// ting nge 'dzi rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ti 'dzin rnams ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis
221a6('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma
221a7('bum): yin no// mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag
221a8('bum): par rig pa rnams ma yin no// byams pa chen po'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni byams pa chen po ma yin no// snying rje chen po'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ snying rje che
221b1('bum): bams na// sangs rgyam rgya chos ma 'dres pa ca brgyang rtsi bab banyid gang yin badzin/ sangs rgyas chos sa 'dres sgra rnams ma mangs/ rnams cad shes ba
221b2('bum): pa nyid gang yin 'di ni thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no// 
221b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyas
221b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs gti dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba gting dang
221b5('bum): dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes gting dang / ga dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
221b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' nas
221b7('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gtang dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te na
221b8('bum): ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngo do// gal te sna gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyodan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
222a1('bum): pa la spyod da/ gal te lce gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus gting dpa/ 
222a2('bum): dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te
222a3('bum): gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ gal te sgra gting dpag dka' zhes bye bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
222a4('bum): la spyod do// gal te dri gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spro dad na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ro gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na
222a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal ter/ gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// g.yo te chos
222a6('bum): gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyis
222a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod ro// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyongan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par
222a8('bum): shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ 
222b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod // gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar ma spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ya
222b2('bum): rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyodan
222b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg
222b4('bum): pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'du sa te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bas spyod na/ 
222b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi smra ngan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
222b6('bum): gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gting
222b7('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
222b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te
223a1('bum): lce'i 'dus te rag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gting dang ga dga' zhes bya ba ma spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyo // kal ta
223a2('bum): 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gting pag dga' zhes bya bar ma spyongan shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyong // gas te ring gyi 'dus te ga pa'i rkyen gyis tshong ba gta
223a3('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sa'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
223a4('bum): byin pa la spyod do// gal te chu'i khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mo'i khams gting dpag
223a5('bum): dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rlung gi khams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
223a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// gal te na mkha'i yas ting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams
223a7('bum): gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ma rig pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
223a8('bum): bal spyod do// gal te 'du byed gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes
223b1('bum): bya bar ma spyod na/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod // gar te ya dang gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar ma spyodan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod / 
223b2('bum): gal te skye mched drug gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te reg pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes/ 
223b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sred pa gtang
223b4('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te len pa gting / dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
223b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te srid pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyodan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te skye ba gting
223b6('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rga shi gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
223b7('bum): la spyod do// gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
223b8('bum): gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab
224a1('bum): sbyin pa la spyor// gal 'chon grus rgyal rol tu byed bug ga/ nas rgya byung/ gas la tu gyu pa
224a2('bum): spyod do// gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
224a3('bum): pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// gal te nang stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
224a4('bum): la spyod do// gal te phyi stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhe/ sa bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid gting dpag pa// 
224a5('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ 
224a6('bum): spyod do// gal te chen po stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya
224a7('bum): bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
224a8('bum): gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes
224b1('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod ra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stsod/ 
224b2('bum): do/ gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar
224b3('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal/ 
224b4('bum): te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi da spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// / gal te mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes
224b5('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod // gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gting dang / dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi rol tu
224b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
224b7('bum): nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na
224b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal/ 
225a1('bum): te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya ba mi spyodan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dbang po rnams
225a2('bum): gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te stobs rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi
225a3('bum): pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
225a4('bum): te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gting dpag dka/ 'a zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i bden
225a5('bum): ba rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bas ma gtan rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na
225a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshad med pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs
225a7('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar
225a8('bum): ma myongan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la srung ngo // dal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gting dbag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyodan/ shes rab kyi
225b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
225b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams gting dag // zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams gting
225b3('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
225b4('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mi 'jigs
225b5('bum): pa bzhi gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te so sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyodan
225b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te byams pa chen po gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te snying rje chen po
225b7('bum): gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
225b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lam gyi rnam pa
226a1('bum): shes pa nyid gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gting
226a2('bum): dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs
226a3('bum): ma yin no// tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no// 'du shes kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni 'du shes ma yin no// 'dra
226a4('bum): byed kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byedam yin no// rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dkarab gang yin de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// 
226a5('bum): mig gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ mig ma yin no// rna ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang min ba de ni/ rna ba ma yin no// sna'i gting dpag dka'
226a6('bum): bgang yin pa de ni sna ma yin no// lce'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ lce ma yin no// lus kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni lus ma yin no// 
226a7('bum): yid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa den yid ma yin no// gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// sgra'i gting dpag
226a8('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ sgra ma yin no// dri'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ dri ma yin no// ro'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa deni/ ro ma yin no// reg
226b1('bum): gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin bden/ reg ma yin no// chos kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de na chos ma yin no// mig gi rnam par shes pa
226b2('bum): gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// 
226b3('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni / lce'i rnam par shes
226b4('bum): pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpagadaka' ba gang yin pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes dpa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag
226b5('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'in sa pa ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ga ting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ mig gi 'dus te
226b6('bum): reg pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin 'di
226b7('bum): ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag
226b8('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// mig gi
227a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin bden/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus
227a2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gting ngo/ 
227a3('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gtang dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni lce'i
227a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// lus dkyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gting dpag / da' ba gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
227a5('bum): gyis tshor ba ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i/ na gyis tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin 'dzin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// 
227a6('bum): sa'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ sa'i khams ma yin no// chu'i khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams ma yin no// / 
227a7('bum): khams kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin bden/ me'i khams ma yin no// rlung gi khams kyi gting dag dga' ba gang yin pa den/ rlung ga khams ma yin no// nam
227a8('bum): khangs kyi gting da ga ga' bgang yin 'dzin na la'i khamam ma mas rnam pa shes pa'i bams kyi gting da ga 'a ba gang yin paden rnam pa nas
227b1('bum): pa'i khams ma yin no// ma rig pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa den ma rig pa ma yin no// 'du byed kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin bden 'du byed ma yin/ 
227b2('bum): rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// ming dang gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni ming dang
227b3('bum): gzugs ma yin no// skye mched drug gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug ma yin no// reg pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ reg
227b4('bum): pa ma yin no// tshor ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yi na ba de ni/ tshor ba ma yin no// sred pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ sred pa ma
227b5('bum): yin no// len pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ len pa ma yin no// srid pa'i gting dang / ga dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ srid pa ma yin no// 
227b6('bum): skye ba'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ skye ba ma yin no// rga shi'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rga shi ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting
227b7('bum): dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha
227b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha
228a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i gting dang ga dka' ba gang yin badzin brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gta
228a2('bum): dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
228a3('bum): byin pa ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// gyi stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin 'don/ 
228a4('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong pa da ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag
228a5('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid kyi gting dka' gang yin pa de ni/ chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// 
228a6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de na don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus
228a7('bum): byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba yin bde na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
228a8('bum): gting dpag dka' ba gang yin bden mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin bden/ thog ma dang
228b1('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag
228b2('bum): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// / 
228b3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ mi dmig
228b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po med pa stong pa nyi da kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
228b5('bum): kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid sto pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ dngos
228b6('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba'i
228b7('bum): gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ma yin no// 
228b8('bum): dbang po'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po ma yin no// stobs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa deni/ stobs ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan
229a1('bum): lag gi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
229a2('bum): gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags
229a3('bum): ba'i bden pa ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan ma yin no// tshad med pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ 
229a4('bum): tshad med pa ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i snyomadas par 'jug pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa/ de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ma
229a5('bum): yin no// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi gting dang ga dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
229a6('bum): bar 'jug pa dgu'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
229a7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
229a8('bum): pa med pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ mngon par shes pa ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin gyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ ting nge
229b1('bum): 'dzin ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i gting dpag dka' ba gang
229b2('bum): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin no// mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma yin no// so so
229b3('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa ma yin no// byams pa chen po'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni
229b4('bum): byams pa chen po ma yin no// snying rje chen po'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ snying rje chen po ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa btso
229b5('bum): brgyad kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ sangs/ rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma yin no// thams cad shes pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin
229b6('bum): bde ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no// rnam pa
229b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems/ 
229b8('bum): dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs tshad med do// zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
230a1('bum): gal te tshor ba chad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ngo // gal te 'du shes tshad med do// zhes bya bar ma spyongs/ 
230a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed chad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa tshang
230a3('bum): med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te
230a4('bum): rnang tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna tshad ma dang do zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
230a5('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te lce tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes
230a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yong tshad med do zhes byab ma spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ 
230a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong ngo // gal te sna tshad med do zhes bya ba ma spyod na shes rab kyi rol tu byo pa la zu // gal te dri cang medzad nas bya ba mi hU~M/ 
230a8('bum): na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal tor ro chad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rig chad med de nas bya
230b1('bum): masrung na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chos tshang med do zhes bya bar ma spyongan/ shes rab tu rol tu phyin pa la byung // gal te migs rnam par na/ 
230b2('bum): patshang med do zhes bya bar ma spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa tshang med do zhes bya bar mi spyodan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
230b3('bum): // gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa cang med nga nas bya bar ma spyod ni/ shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa la rung // gal te lce'i rnam pa shes pa chang bang du zhes bya ba mo ston
230b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyai rnam par shes pa tshad med do// zhes bya ba mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
230b5('bum): gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa tshad med de zhes byab spyod de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gal te mig gi 'dus te rig pa chad meng dog
230b6('bum): bya bar ma stong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ngo // gal te rnga ba'i 'dus te reg pa tshang meng ngo zhes bya bar ma spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ 
230b7('bum): gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa tshad med do zhes bya bar ma spyod no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ngo // gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa tshad med do zhes bya bar mo spyod na/ sa
230b8('bum): tshal me tshun pa la grus// ga gi sus kyi sa ga cang bang nas bya mi spong / shes rabatha phyin pa la spangs gags tsa'i
231a1('bum): tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba tshad med pa na
231a2('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chang med do zhes bya bang mo spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
231a3('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rten rjes tshor ba tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyad na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa
231a4('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lu ngas kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba tshang med do zhes
231a5('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rgyu/  do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis/ tshor ba tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab
231a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te so'i khams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chu'i khams tshad med do// nas
231a7('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mo'i khams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyodan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
231a8('bum): te rlung gi khams tshad med do zhes bya bar ma spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te na mkha'i khams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyodan shes rab
231b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyang po/ gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams chad med // zhes bya bar ma spyodan/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ma rig
231b2('bum): chang mengad pa zhes bya bar mi spyad na/ shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa la sna // gal te 'du byed mang mang zhes bya bar mi spyodan shes rab kyi sa rol tu phyin pa la spyod / 
231b3('bum): gal te rnam par shes pa tshad med nga zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te song dang gzugs chad med do nas bya ba ma spyodan shes rab kyi sa
231b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// gal te skye mchod drug cha/  med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te reg pa chang sa
231b5('bum): de zhes bya bar mi spyad na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu napa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba chad med do zhes bya bang mi spyongasashes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa
231b6('bum): spyad do// gam te srid pa chad med nge zhes bya bar mo sto na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do// gal te len pa tshang ming zhes bya bar ma ston/ sa
231b7('bum): ro kyi pa rol tu phyin pa la rlu nga // g.yo te srod pa tshad meng nge zhes bya bar ma spyod / shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te skye ba tshang med na nas
231b8('bum): bar ma gyung / shes rib kyil ro tu phyin pa la srung // gal rten shi mang mengad nas bya bar mo spyod du/ shes gyi rab tu phyin pa la spyong // gas
232a1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chang meng nga zhes bya bar mi spyo na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma byu // nam tu tshul khrims
232a2('bum): pha rab tu phyin pa chad med du nas bya bar mi snang shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod // gal te bzo pa' pa'im tu phyin pa chang medang nas bya
232a3('bum): srushes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa 'i spyang // gal te bdun 'grus kyi pha ri ma tu byin pa tshad med do zhes bya bar ma spyod na shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa ma
232a4('bum): gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do na/ bya bar mi spyod ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod // gal te shes rab kyi rom tu phyin
232a5('bum): tshad med de zhes bya bar mi spyodan/ shes rab tu rol tu phyin pa la stongango // gal tan / ba nyid chad meng// zhes bya ba ma spyod
232a6('bum): shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyang // gam stong ba nyid chang med pa zhes bya bar ma spyod/ shes rab tu pha rol tu phyid pa la sna // gal te
232a7('bum): banyid tshad med nganas bya ba ma sbya / parabatu pha rol tu phyin pa la smad // gal gi snying banyid stong pa nyid chang mengadang nis bya ma rjid
232a8('bum): rkyen pa la byung sa// gal te cha ba snang pa nyid chang mang nis byab mi myong / shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la blang // ga'i ti ngas pa stong pa
232b1('bum): meng do nas bya 'ang ma spyon shes rab tu rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid chang mngang zhes bya bar ma spyod na/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la smra/ 
232b2('bum): gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid chang med nga zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid chang med do zhes bya bar mi spyo
232b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thogs dang tham med pa stong pa nyid tshad med do// zhes bya bar mi spongan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod do// 
232b4('bum): te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid tshang med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ 
232b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sa thams cad stong pa nyid tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
232b6('bum): gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid tshad med do zhes bya ba
232b7('bum): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
232b8('bum): gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshad med do zhes bya bar mi
233a1('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab tu
233a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
233a3('bum): pa rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dbang po rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
233a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod do// gal te stobs rnams tshad me/ dad do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te byang chub kyi yan
233a5('bum): lag rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshad med do zhes bya
233a6('bum): bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa la/ 
233a7('bum): spyod do// gal te bsam gtan rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshad med pa rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod
233a8('bum): na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
233b1('bum): spyod do// gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag
233b2('bum): tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa/ 
233b3('bum): tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
233b4('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs kyi
233b5('bum): sgo rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad med do zhes bya bar
233b6('bum): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mi 'jigs pa bzhi tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
233b7('bum): te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te byams pa chen po tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ 
233b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// stong rje chen po tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos sa
234a1('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid tshad med do zhes/ 
234a2('bum): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
234a3('bum): gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// 
234a4('bum): bam po nyis brgya gnyis pa// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa ni / gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba'i tshad med pa gang
234a5('bum): yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin no// 'du shes rgya tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du shes ma yin na 'du byed kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed/ 
234a6('bum): ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// mig gi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ mig ma yin no// rna ba'i tshad
234a7('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba ma yin no// sna'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna ma yin no// lce'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce ma yin no// lus kyi tshad med pa gang
234a8('bum): yin pa de ni/ lus ma yin no// yid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid ma yin no// gzugs kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin no// sgra'i
234b1('bum): tshad med pa gang yin bden/ sgra ma yin no// dri'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ dri ma yin no// ro'i tshad med pa gang yin den/ ro ma yin no// reg gi tshad med pa gang
234b2('bum): yin 'de ni/ reg ma yin no// chos kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos ma yin no// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ mig gi rnam par shes
234b3('bum): pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pade ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i rnam
234b4('bum): par shes pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i tshad med
234b5('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa na yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no// mig gi 'dus
234b6('bum): te reg pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// 
234b7('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yino// / 
234b8('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
235a1('bum): ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// 
235a2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad
235a3('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg
235a4('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te/ dag reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// yid
235a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// sa'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang
235a6('bum): yin pa de ni/ sa'i khams ma yin no// chu'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ chu'i khams ma yin no// me'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ 
235a7('bum): me'i khams ma yin no// rlung gi khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rlung gi khams ma yin no// na mkha'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ na mkha'i
235a8('bum): khams ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no// ma rig pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ 
235b1('bum): ma rig pa ma yin no// 'du byed kyi tshang med pa gang yin bden/ 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa den/ rnam par shes pa ma yin na/ 
235b2('bum): ming dang gzugs kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ ming dang gzugs ma yin no// skye mched drug gi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye mched drug ma yin no// reg pa'i tshad
235b3('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni/ reg pa ma yin no// tshor ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin no// sred pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ sred pa ma yin no// 
235b4('bum): len pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ len pa ma yin/ no// srid pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ srid pa ma yin no// skye ba'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni// 
235b5('bum): skye ba ma yin no// rga shi'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rga shi ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ 'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
235b6('bum): po ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang
235b7('bum): yin pa de ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// bsam
235b8('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes ra
236a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa
236a2('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang
236a3('bum): yin pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med
236a4('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus ma byas/ 
236a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin 'din 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin bden/ mtha'
236a6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dor ba med pa/ 
236a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin bden dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no// 
236a8('bum): chas thams cad stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin bden/ rang na
236b1('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// ma migs stong ba nyid kyi chang med pa gang yin 'don/ mi dmigs pa stong pa na dam man no// rlom pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi chang me
236b2('bum): pa gang yin pa de na dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de na/ ngon nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
236b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin bden/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
236b4('bum): rnams ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi tshad med dpa gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi tshad med pa ga
236b5('bum): yin pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no// dbang po rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnams ma yin no// stobs rnams kyi chang
236b6('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni/ stobs rnams ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no// 'phags pa'i
236b7('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags/ 
236b8('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin no// tshad med pa rnams kyi chadang med pa gang yin 'den
237a1('bum): tshad med pa rnams ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa/ 
237a2('bum): rnams ma yin no// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin no// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i tshad med pa gang
237a3('bum): yin pa de ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i tshad med pa gang
237a4('bum): yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni// 
237a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin na// mas kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi tshad
237a6('bum): med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma
237a7('bum): yin no// mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ 
237a8('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no// byams pa chen po'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ byams pa chen po ma yin no// snying rje chen pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pade
237b1('bum): ni snying rje chen po ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no// thams
237b2('bum): cad shes pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ lam gyi rnam pa
237b3('bum): shes pa nyid ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa kye ma
237b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni// de ltar gting dpag dka'o// de ltar rtogs par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
237b5('bum): phyin pa 'don/ de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'o// bcu ma ldan 'das 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i mdun du
237b6('bum): bshad par mi bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ 'jigs dang zhing skrag par gyur tu mchi'o// the tshom dang / nem nur 'tshal tu mchi'o// 
237b7('bum): mos par yang mi 'gyur du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa
237b8('bum): bgyi ste/ des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs/ mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur ro// the tsom dang / nem nur 'tshal bar mi 'gyurate
238a1('bum): thos nas kyang gong nas gong du mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
238a2('bum): bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te theg pa la gsar
238a3('bum): du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na nyes pa cir 'gyur/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa
238a4('bum): ke'u shi ka gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du/  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa de shes
238a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nasa'ajigs par 'gyur/ dngang par 'gyur/ skrag pa ra 'gyur te/ phyir zlog par 'gyur ro// spong bar
238a6('bum): 'gyur ro// de ni mos par yang mi 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha
238a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas spangs pa'i phyir/ de log par ltung bar 'gyur ba'i lus mngon par byed cing stsogs pa dang / las byas pa dang / bsags pas des kyang bla na med/ 
238a8('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgya bar yang dka' ba de lta bu'i gnas yod do// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
238b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs/ mi dang skrag par mi 'gyur ba lta yod
238b2('bum): dam/ smras pa/ ko'u sha ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi dngang / skrag par mi
238b3('bum): 'gyur ba de dag ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
238b4('bum): sangs rgyas gcig gam/ gnyis las mi 'da' ba dar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du lung bstan par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
238b5('bum): kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
238b6('bum): bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mi 'jigs/ mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur zhing / zos nas kyang gong nas gong du 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 
238b7('bum): klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'o// pha rol tu
238b8('bum): phyin pa drug la spyad pa'o// sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bskur byas pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dpe gsal bar bdag gis spobs so// bde
239a1('bum): bar gshegs pa de'i dpe bdag gis gsal bar spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyi spobs pa skyed
239a2('bum): cig sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me'i rmi lam na/ shes rab
239a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing / bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bzod pa sgrub dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / sbyin pa yongs su
239a4('bum): gtong ba nas/ snying po byang chub la mchis pa'i bar du gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
239a5('bum): chub tu nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi na/ bcom ldan pa/ des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gan da kyis ma log pa zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
239a6('bum): byin pa bsgom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag pa dang / brtson 'grus btsams pa dang / bzod pa bsgrubs pa dang / tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang / sbyin pa
239a7('bum): yongs su gtang ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa rig par bgyi ba'o// 
239a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par gyur te/ thos nas kyang 'dzin cing de bzhin du nan tan du bgyid pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa ste/ 
239b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par btsang ba dang / tshul bzhi du mang la btsud par
239b2('bum): dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs shing / dge ba'i rtsab bskyed pa'o// sangs rgyas mang po la snyen bkur ba'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu 'azung
239b3('bum): ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang / nye bar gyur pa ste/ bla na med pa yang nga/ 
239b4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro// dbacom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo nga gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'thad cing 'thad
239b5('bum): par gyur nas kyang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul/ bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu/ 
239b6('bum): mo de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bgyi ba dag go// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la 'brog dgon/ 
239b7('bum): pa dpag tshad brgya pa zhig nas 'byung ba 'am/ 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad nyis brgya pa dang / sum brgya pa dang / bzhi brgya pa dang / lnga brgya pa nas 'byung ba zhig mchis la de
239b8('bum): 'byung ba'i tshe/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong brdal dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi snga ltas/ ba lang rdzi'am/ phyugs rdzi 'am/ sa mtshams sam/ bza' shing
240a1('bum): / gir ba phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa mthong ngam/ de ma lags pa gzhan yang mtshan ma gang gis grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong
240a2('bum): brdal lam/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i phro brang 'khor mchis par mngon pa'i snga ltas de lta bu dag mthong na/ de 'di snyam du gyur te/ snga ltas 'di dag snang ba las na/ 'dra
240a3('bum): nas grong ngam/ grong khyer ram grong brdal lam/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i phra brang 'khor ni nye'o snyam ste/ dbugs byin par 'gyur zhing / de la de slan chad rkun pa'i 'ji
240a4('bum): pa'am/ chos po'i 'jig pa'am/ gcan dam za 'jigs pa 'am/ bkres pa dang / sgom pa'i 'jigs pa mtshachis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/ 
240a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gang gshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dang 'phrang ba gyur te/ 'phrang bar gyur nas kyang / 'dzin pa dang / 
240a6('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das do / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don lung
240a7('bum): bstan pa la nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi ba ste/ ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
240a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ de yang slan chad nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisas 'jigs par mi 'gyi'o// de ci'i slad du seMn/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi rol/ 
240b1('bum): byin pa dpas 'di sgyu ba dang / phyag sargya dang / mnan dus tshas pa ning blan med pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i drung chub kyi sngags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
240b2('bum): sharan ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sha rang ti'i bu khyod kyi dadung yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus spobs bskyed cig/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 
240b3('bum): gul la zhig rgya mche'i mching rnam chen po blta bar 'tshal nas/ de rgya mtsho chen po blta 'tshal ba'i slad du ji lta ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar mchis pa de lta de ltar/ ldum bu'am/ 
240b4('bum): ldum bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am/ ri'i mtshan mam mthong na/ des 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po thag ni ste/ 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po ring po med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
240b5('bum): rgya mtsho chen po ni bags kyis gzhol ba ste/ 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po'i drung dung ni ring po med do// dadang ba na ni ldum bu 'am/ ldum bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am/ 
240b6('bum): ri'i mtshan ma gang yang med do// zhes bgyi bar rig par bgyi'o// de ltar skyes bu de'i mig gis rgya mtsho chen po ma mthong du lags kyang / des bdag ni rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar
240b7('bum): gyur to// rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di na yod do// rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di phan chad mi ring ngo zhes bya bar rtogs par 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
240b8('bum): byin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
241a1('bum): kyang / bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ khyod bskal ba ni 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa brgya phrag na
241a2('bum): 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa brgya stong phrag ni 'di nyid cig/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di skad cig na/ bla na med pa yang
241a3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang brgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon sum du lung bstan pas/ da dung lung ma bstan gyis kyang / bdag
241a4('bum): ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang nye bar gnas pa blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dade ni 'di ltar bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
241a5('bum): 'di blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur dum / mnyan tu yod do// zos nas kyang gzung dum // bcang du yang / bklag tu med/ kur chu
241a6('bum): byar yod/ tshul bzhin du yid la byar yod do zhes bgyi bar rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ dpyid kyi dus la bab ste/ rtsi shing gi laM ma dang / 'dab ma
241a7('bum): lhags nas/ kha dog gyur pa'i tshe/ 'dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis ring po mi thogs par lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ 
241a8('bum): 'di ltar snga ltas 'di dag rtsi shing las snang ngo zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ gang gi tshe rtsi shing rnams lo ma dang me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang bung
241b1('bum): med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag gis rtswa shing gi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa de dag mthong nas nyams bde bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan/ 
241b2('bum): 'das de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyan tu mchos
241b3('bum): te/ thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ 
241b4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su smin par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ da ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis par rig pa
241b5('bum): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po des kyang / 'di ltar bdag gis sha sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bya
241b6('bum): ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyan tu yod pa dang / ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du byar yod pa ni/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsabs/ bla na med pa yang dag/ 
241b7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur to zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas lha'i bu sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
241b8('bum): dpa' chen po de'i snga ltas de dag mthong nas/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lung bstan par 'gyur ba la yang snga ltas 'di dag byung gis/ byang chub sems dpa'
242a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'di yang ring por mi thogs parabla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro// zhes dga' zhing spro la/ 
242a2('bum): yid bde zhing nyams bde bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na bud med sbrum ma ni/ ji lta ji ltar btsar nye ba de lta de ltar lus 'gyur te/ de lta de ltar slar
242a3('bum): zhing lus ngal la rgyud zhan zhing mi dga' la/ kha zas yi gar mi mchi zhing / rmugs pa dang gnyid kyang chung ngu 'gyur te/ nyams mi bde ba des/ smra ba nyung zhing bsten pa'i
242a4('bum): ngang tshul ma mchis la sngon tshul bzhin ma lags pa'i yid la bgyid pa brten pa dang / bsnyen pa des rnam pa/ de lta bu'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/ bud med gzhan dag
242a5('bum): gis bud med de'i mtshan ma ji lta ji ltar mthong ba las/ bud med 'di ni ring po mi thogs par btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ zhes bgyi bar 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das de
242a6('bum): bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur ba legs pa'i spyod pa spyang pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
242a7('bum): gyis yongs su bzung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa rnams la yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'thad par 'gyur te/ 'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin cing
242a8('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ring po thogs par bla na
242b1('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur bar rig par bgyid na bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so// sha radwa
242b2('bum): bu khyod kyi spobs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus skyes so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
242b3('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de ltar legs par yongs su bzung ba ni ngo mtshar che'o// 
242b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la
242b5('bum): bde ba dang / 'jig rten la stong brtse ba dang / lha dang / mi'i skye bo tshogs pal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
242b6('bum): chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spang ba spyod pa'icha/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can brgya stong mang po la phan 'dogs te/ bzhi gang zhen/ 
242b7('bum): sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don tu spyod pa dang / don 'thun par spyad pa de dag gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi las la yang dag par bskul lo// bdag kyang bsam gtan
242b8('bum): dang po la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang bsam gtan dang po la yang dag par bskul lo// bdag kyang bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang bsamagata/ 
243a1('bum): gnyis pa la yang dag par bskul lo// bdag kyang bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang bsam gtan gsum pa la yang dag par bskul lo// bdag
243a2('bum): kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang dag par bskul lo// bdag kyang byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug la gzhan
243a3('bum): yang byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par bskul lo// bdag kyang snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par bskul lo// 
243a4('bum): bdag kyang dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par bskul lo// bdag kyang btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la
243a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par bskul lo// bdag kyang na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug la
243a6('bum): gzhan yang na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par bskul lo// bdag kyang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug la gzhan yang rnam shes mtha' yas skye
243a7('bum): mched la yang dag par bskal lo// bdag kyang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang dag par bskul lo// bdag kyang
243a8('bum): 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched la yang dag par bskul lo// bdag kyang sbyin pa
243b1('bum): yongs su gtong la/ gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par bsku'o// das chu 'dris srung ga su chu khri pa la cu'o// bdag kyang bzod pa bsgom la gzhan yang bzod pa yang dag par bsku'o// 
243b2('bum): bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom la/ gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang bsam gtan la yang dag par
243b3('bum): skul lo// bdag kyang shes rab sgom la/ gzhan yang shes rab sgom pa la yang dag par skul lo// de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / thabs mkhas pas/ 
243b4('bum): sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god/ da kyang bdag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed do// / gzhan lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god kyang / 
243b5('bum): bdag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed do// gzhan phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god kyang / bdag phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed do// gzhan
243b6('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god kyang / bdag dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mi byed do// gzhan rang byang chub la rab tu 'god kyang / bdag rang byang chub mngon du mi byed do// bdag
243b7('bum): kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
243b8('bum): phyin pa la spyod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyo
244a1('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
244a2('bum): phyin pa la spyod la byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
244a3('bum): la spyod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sku'o// bdag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la
244a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sku 'o// / bdag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su gnon la/ gzhan
244a5('bum): yang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu 'god do// bdag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed la/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya ba la yang
244a6('bum): dag par skul lo// bdag kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed la/ gzhan yang sems can yongasu smin par bya ba la yang skul lo// bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par
244a7('bum): shes pa skyed la/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa la yang dag par bskul lo// bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su sbyong la/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo yongasu
244a8('bum): sbyong ba la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed la/ gzhan yang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang
244b1('bum): gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin la/ gzhan yang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba la yang dag par sku'o// bdag kyang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yong
244b2('bum): su 'dzin/ gzhan yang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang gzhon nu'i sa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin la/ gzhan yang
244b3('bum): gzhon nu'is phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bani sgom la/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang dag par sprul lo// 
244b4('bum): bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom la/ gzhan yang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang dag par sku'o// bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom la/ gzhan yang
244b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang dbang po lnga sgom la/ gzhan yang dang / nga po lnga la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang stobs lnga
244b6('bum): skem la/ gzhan yang stobs lnga la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom la gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang dag par sku 'o// ba
244b7('bum): kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom la/ gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom la/ 
244b8('bum): gzhan yang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bsam gtan bani sgom la/ gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// bdag
245a1('bum): kyang chad med pa pan sgom la/ gzhan yang chad med pa ban la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa ngan
245a2('bum): sgom la/ gzhan yang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom la/ gzhan yang rnam par thar pa brgyad
245a3('bum): layang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu skom la/ gzhan yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag 'a
245a4('bum): skul lo// bdag kyang rnam par thar pa na stong pa nyid dang / mtshan mi meng ba dang / smon med pasgom la/ gzhan yang rnam par thar pabasgra ste/ 
245a5('bum): po nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med ba la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang mdza bar shes pa lnga bsgom la/ gzhan yang mngon par
245a6('bum): shes lnga la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin thams cad la yang dag par sku'o// bdag
245a7('bum): kyang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad sgom la/ gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par sprul lo// bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom la/ gzhan yang
245a8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom la/ gzhan yang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// bdag
245b1('bum): kyang so so yang dag par rig pa pa ni mngon par sgrub la/ gzhan yang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang byams pa chen po bsgom la/ gzhan yang
245b2('bum): byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang snying rje chen po sgom la/ gzhan yang snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
245b3('bum): brgyad sgrub la/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed la/ gzhan yang rnam pa
245b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong la gzhan yang bag chags kyi
245b5('bum): tshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la yang dag par skul lo// bdag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor/ la gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba la yang dag
245b6('bum): par skal lo// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ 
245b7('bum): po yon tan mang po dang ldan pa de dag/ sems can thams cad kyi slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
245b8('bum): bar 'tshang rgya ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa
246a1('bum): ma/ [ऽ] na pa rnam pa sasu zugs par thu r+dz+dza/ sa rnas sa a g+ha swA/

246b1('bum): rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//

246b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lce'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha

247a1('bum): dag par rjes mi mthong bde'i cha/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// @

248b3('bum): reg pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byo/ 
248b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro// dal tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lce'i 'dus te re/ ga pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe
248b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
248b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha
248b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam yid kyi 'dus
248b8('bum): te reg pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
249a1('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba
249a2('bum): yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub
249a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ 
249a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
249a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam snaH 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba yang dag/ par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
249a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ 
249a7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
249a8('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lus kyi 'dus te reg
249b1('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
249b2('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de
249b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha
249b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam sa'i khams kyi 'phye la ba yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol
249b5('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa spyod pa'i tshe/ nam chu'i
249b6('bum): khams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab
249b7('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam me'i khams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rje su ma mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems
249b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
250a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rlung gi khams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rje sum mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab
250a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam na mkha
