278b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ming dang gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par
278b8('bum): byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te skye mched drug bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar
279a1('bum): 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
279a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
279a3('bum): byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i gal te tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar
279a4('bum): 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ na pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes
279a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal sred pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu
279a6('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen poshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te len pa bsam gyis mi khyab
279a7('bum): ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
279a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// / 
279b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na
279b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe
279b3('bum): gal te rga shi bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
279b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na
279b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
279b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed
279b7('bum): pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab
279b8('bum): ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab
280a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chagal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na
280a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o tshe gal te
280a3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems
280a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gal te she/ des rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya
280a5('bum): bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
280a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par
280a7('bum): byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar
280a8('bum): 'du shes pa med nashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
280b1('bum): la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// 
280b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshegal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa
280b3('bum): med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
280b4('bum): gal te chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab da kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// 
280b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces
280b6('bum): bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol
280b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'du shes stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed
280b8('bum): pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
281a1('bum): ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
281a2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha
281a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i gal te thog ma dang
281a4('bum): rna ma med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba/ dar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang
281a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshegal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab
281a6('bum): ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
281a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su
281a8('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid
281b1('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
281b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
281b3('bum): yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
281b4('bum): bsam gyis khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
281b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
281b6('bum): phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa
281b7('bum): nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
281b8('bum): poshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab
282a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa yongs rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pan/ 
282a2('bum): chegal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// bya
282a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du
282a4('bum): shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub se/ rnams dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
282a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
282a6('bum): yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dbang po rnams bsam gyis/ 
282a7('bum): mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
282a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o/ 
282b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'dra/ 
282b2('bum): shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
282b3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par
282b4('bum): byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i bden rnams
282b5('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ ra byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
282b6('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi
282b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshad
282b8('bum): med pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems
283a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam
283a2('bum): gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
283a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
283a4('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sedams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mthar gyis gnas
283a5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi phar/ la tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub
283a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
283a7('bum): pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
283a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
283b1('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya
283b2('bum): bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ 
283b3('bum): gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
283b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med
283b5('bum): na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/ chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
283b6('bum): tshe/ gal te mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems
283b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ 
283b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te snying
284a1('bum): rje chen po bsas kyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub
284a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med
284a3('bum): ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsheg
284a4('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub se
284a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes
284a6('bum): pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal
284a7('bum): te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar 'du shes pa med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
284a8('bum): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la su zhig mos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gang
284b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen pa// rab dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yong su bzung ba de dag ni/ 
284b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu
284b3('bum): phyin pa drug la spyad pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu bzung ba lags
284b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
284b5('bum): gzugs su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gzugs kyi/ mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gzu gas kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// tsher
284b6('bum): bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// 'du shes su mi rtog rnam par
284b7('bum): mi rtog go// 'du shes kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// 'du shes kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// 'du byed du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ 
284b8('bum): 'du byed kyi mtshan mar mi rtag rnam par mi rtog go// 'du byed kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa
285a1('bum): mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog no/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// mig du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ 
285a2('bum): mig gi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// mig gi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rna bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ rna ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam/ 
285a3('bum): par mi rtog go// rna ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// snar mi rtog rnam par ma rtog go// sna'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// sna'i rang bzhin
285a4('bum): du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ lcer mi rtag rnam pa dar mi rtog go// lce'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// lce'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi
285a5('bum): rtag go/ lus su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ lus kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ lus kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ yid
285a6('bum): du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ yid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// yid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gzugs su mi rtog rnam par mi
285a7('bum): rtog go/ gzugs kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gzugs kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// sgrar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ sgra'i
285a8('bum): mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ sgra'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// drir mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ dri'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog
285b1('bum): drubang na dus taganas par martan/ jam tug nas par ma rtags/ rajams na sa matag rnas par martag/ ra nga ban du nga ba man
285b2('bum): rig tu matag rnam par martogs/ rigags can sa ma rtag nas par mgags/ reg gi rang bzhin du satog rnam pa ma rtog/  tag rnas pa
285b3('bum): sa mtshan ma ma rgyug rnam par martaganargyas kyi rang na dus rtog nas par dag/ seMg+sa gnas pa shes par matag rnam pa me nan
285b4('bum): gsanam pa shes pa mtshan ma ma sa rnamapa gam rnam pa shes du garnam pa dang na
285b5('bum): garnam par na/ na ma sa pa sa mnam / gnas pa zhananas she pa na jug
285b6('bum): martags/ sgra'i rnam par shes param rtag rnam par martog/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar ma tog rnam par ma rton to// snga'i rnam par shes pa'i nga / 
285b7('bum): dus gnas pa marten// lho rnas pa shes par martag rnam pa ma ga/ rje rnas shes pa'i mtshan sa m-i rtaganas pa mdun do/ 
285b8('bum): shes pa'i rang ban dubatag nam pa martags/ sa pa rnam pa gas pa ma da ga ma mnan/ lum ma ma mtsha
286a1('bum): pa ma rtag/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang na rna rnam par martagan/ mang kyi rnam pa shes par matog rnam ma/ 
286a2('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par martag go// ying kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog // mig gi 'dus te reg par mi rtog rnam par
286a3('bum): ma rtog pa// mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtshan mar ma rtog rnam par ma rtagag/ mig gi 'dus te rig pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtag gi// rna ba'i 'dus te reg
286a4('bum): par ma rtog rnam par ma rtog go// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ 
286a5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam parami rtog go// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin du ma
286a6('bum): rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ lce'i 'dus te reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// lce'i 'dus te reg
286a7('bum): pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ lus kyi 'dus te reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// 
286a8('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// yid kyi 'dus te reg par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog
286b1('bum): rnam par mi rtog go// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par ma rtog go/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtogs ma rtog go// mig rga
286b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mo rtog das 'a brten // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rna ba'i 'dus te
286b3('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi
286b4('bum): tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam dpar mi rtog go// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
286b5('bum): tshor ba'i mtshan mar mo rtog rnam par mi rtog go// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang ba na na du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// lce'i 'dus te reg
286b6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
286b7('bum): gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
286b8('bum): gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
287a1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor bar mi rtog rnam par ma rtog go// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan mar ma rtog rnam par mi rtog go// yid
287a2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// sa'i khams su mi rtog rnam par rtog go// sa'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par
287a3('bum): mi rtog go// sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// chu'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ chu'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par
287a4('bum): mi rtog go// chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// me'i khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// me'i khams kyi
287a5('bum): mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// me'i kham sa kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rlung gi khams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rlung
287a6('bum): gi khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// namakha'i khams su mi rtog rnam par ma rtog go/ 
287a7('bum): namakha'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// namakha'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rtog rnam par ma
287a8('bum): rtog go// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan mar mo rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// ma rig par
287b1('bum): brtog rnam par martog / ma rig par mtshan mar martog ma par martags ma rig pa'i rang bzhan du btsug rnam par martog go/ 'du byed du ma rtog rnam par
287b2('bum): ma rtog go// 'du byed kyi mtshan mar mo rtog rnam par ma rtag go/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin du ma rtog rnam par ma rtog sa/ rnam par shes par ma rtag rnam pa
287b3('bum): mnyan no// rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du ma rtog rnam par ma rtog no// maung dang gzugs sum
287b4('bum): rtog rnam par sa rtog/ ming dang gzugs kyisachen ma po rtog rnam par mi rtogs/ sing nga/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin du ma rtog rnam par mi rtog / 
287b5('bum): skye mched drug du mi rtotog rnam par mi rtog sa/ mched drug gi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par ma rtog/ skye mched drug gi rang bzhin du ma rtag rnam
287b6('bum): mdzan no// reg par ma tog rnam par rtan no// reg pa'i mtshan mar ma rtog rnam par martanas// reg pa'i rang bzhin du ma tog rnam par ma rtog/ 
287b7('bum): bar mi rtog rnam par ma rtog go/ tshor ba mtshan mar ma rtog rnam par ma rtog sa// tshor ba'i rang bzhin du sa rtog rnam par martog // sred par ma rtag
287b8('bum): par ma rtog / phred pa'i mtshan mar ma tog rnam par ma rtogs// sred pa'i rang bzhin du mo tog rnam par ma rtog sa/ min pa ma rtag nas
288a1('bum): par ma rtog sa len pa'i mtshan mar ma tog rnam par martogag/ len pa'i rang bzhin dum rtog nas par ma rtog go/ smad dang / 
288a2('bum): matog rnam par ma rtog go/ srid pa'i mtshan mar martog rnam par mi rtog go/ srid pa'i rang bzhin du ma rtog rnam par mi rtog go// skye bar mi rtog rnam par martog
288a3('bum): skye ba'i mtshan mar ma rtog rnam par ma rtog na// skye ba'i rang bzhin du ma drug rnam par mi rtog ga/ rga shing ma rtog rnam par maston/ rga sha' mtshan ma
288a4('bum): ma tog rnam par martog go/ rga sha'i rang bzhin dusartog rnam par mi rtogs/ 'dod ba'i khamasasu mi rtog/ ma/ 'dod pa'i khams kyim tshan
288a5('bum): mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ gzugs kyi khams su ma rtog rnam par mi rtog so/ 
288a6('bum): gzugs kyi khams kyi mtshan mar ma rtog rnam par mi rtog sa/ gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par ma rtog ni// gzugs med pa'i khams su mi rtog na/ 
288a7('bum): par mi rtog go// gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog / 
288a8('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du/ 
288b1('bum): mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ 
288b2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan
288b3('bum): mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ 
288b4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go// brtson 'grus kyi pha ro/ la tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ 
288b5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par rmi rtog go// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go
288b6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
288b7('bum): mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// nang stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go
288b8('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// phyi stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par
289a1('bum): ma rtog go// phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar ma rtog rnam par mi rtog ga/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mo rtog rnam par mi rtog go// byin
289a2('bum): stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ 
289a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog/ 
289a4('bum): rnam par mi rtog go// chen po stong pa nyid du mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go// chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// chen po/ 
289a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// don dam pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ go// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog
289a6('bum): rnam par mi rtog go// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// 'dus byas stong
289a7('bum): pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par
289a8('bum): mi rtog go// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// mtha'
289b1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid/ 
289b2('bum): kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi
289b3('bum): rtog rnam par mi rtag go// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// dor ba
289b4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog dgo// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rang bzhin stong pa nyid
289b5('bum): du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rang bzhin stong pa nyi da kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi
289b6('bum): rtartog go// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// chos thams cad stong
289b7('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam
289b8('bum): par mi rtog go// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// mi dmigs
290a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// dngos po med
290a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par
290a3('bum): mi rtag go// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam
290a4('bum): par mi rtog go// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam pa
290a5('bum): mi rtog go// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ 
290a6('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// yang dag par spong ba
290a7('bum): rnamasu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par/ 
290a8('bum): mi rtog go/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rdzu 'phrul gyin rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ca
290b1('bum): rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// dbang po rnamasu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// dbang po rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin
290b2('bum): du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// stobs rnamasu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ stobs rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi
290b3('bum): rtog rnam par mi rtog go// byang chub kyi yan lag rnamasu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// byang
290b4('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam pa mi rtog go// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ 'phags
290b5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rna ma par mi rtog go// 'phags pa'i lam ya na lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog
290b6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnamasu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi
290b7('bum): rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// bsam gtan rnamasu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// bsam gtan rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ bsam gtan
290b8('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// tshad med pa rnamasu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// tshad med pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// tshad med
291a1('bum): pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnamasu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gzugs med pa'i snyoms
291a2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rnam par thar pa
291a3('bum): brgyad du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ mtha'
291a4('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyom das par 'jug pa dgu'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ 
291a5('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang ba zhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rnam par tha/ ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
291a6('bum): pa med par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rnam par thar/ 
291a7('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnamasu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// mngon par
291a8('bum): shes pa rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// ting nge 'dzin rnamasu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog
291b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gzungs kyi sgo rnamasu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ 
291b2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur mi
291b3('bum): rtog rnam par mi rtog go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ 
291b4('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhir mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// mi dajigs pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// / mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// 
291b5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir mi rtog rnam par mi steg go// so so yang dag par rig pa'i mtshan ma ra mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// so so yang dag par
291b6('bum): rig pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ byams pa chen por mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ byams pa chen po'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ byams pa
291b7('bum): chen po'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// snying rje chen por mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// snying rje chen po'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ snying rje chen
291b8('bum): rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rta/ 
292a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhi du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// thams cad shes pa nyid
292a2('bum): kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// 
292a3('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa'i ci mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye
292a4('bum): pa nyid du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// rnam pa thams dacad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang
292a5('bum): bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs bsam gyis mi khya kha bo// tsher ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'du shes
292a6('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// mig bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rna ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sna bas
292a7('bum): gyis mi khyab bo// lce bsam gyis mi khyab bo// lus bsam gyis mi khyab bo// yid bsam gyis mi khyab bo// gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sgra bsam gyis mi khyab bo// dri bsam
292a8('bum): gyis mi khyab bo// ro bsam gyis mi khyab bo// reg bsam gyis mi khyab bo// chos bsam gyis mi khyab bo// mig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
292b1('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// yid kyi rnam par
292b2('bum): shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// lce'i/ 
292b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
292b4('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// lce'i 'dus te reg
292b5('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam gyis na khyab bo// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
292b6('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab bo// chu'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab bo// me'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rlung gi khams bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 
292b7('bum): na mkha'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis mi khyab bo// ma rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'du byed bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rnam par
292b8('bum): shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// ming dang gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab bo// skye mched drug bsam gyis mi khyab bo// reg pa bsam gyis mi khya'o// tshor ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 
293a1('bum): sred pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// len pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// srid pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// skye ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rga shi bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sbyin
293a2('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam
293a3('bum): gyis mi khyab bo// bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo// phyi stong pa nyid
293a4('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab bo// phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khya rab bo// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo// chen po stong po nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo// don dam pa stong
293a5('bum): pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'dus byas stong pa nyid bas ma gyis mi khyab bo// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsam/ gyis mi khyab bo// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyi
293a6('bum): mi khyab bo// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo// chos thams cad sto/ 
293a7('bum): pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo// ngo bo
293a8('bum): nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo// yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam
293b1('bum): gyis mi khyab bo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo// dbang po rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo// stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo// byang chubo yan lag rnams bsam
293b2('bum): gyis mi khyab bo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo// bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 
293b3('bum): tshad med pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab bo// mthar gyis gnas
293b4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med dpa dang / smon pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// mngon par
293b5('bum): shes pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo// ting nge 'dzin rnam sa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pa
293b6('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab bo// mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab bo// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab bo// byams pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab bo// snying
293b7('bum): chen po bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsam gyis mi khyab bo// thams cad shes pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
293b8('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad/ 
294a1('bum): pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu bzung ba yin no// / shes
294a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyis brgya lnga pa/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo// bcom ldan 'das
294a3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor/ 
294a4('bum): 'du shes zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor 'du byed zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa/ 
294a5('bum): zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor mig zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rna ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes
294a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor sna zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor lce zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab
294a7('bum): 'byor lus zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor yid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor gzugs zab pa'i phyir/ shes
294a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor sgra zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor dri zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za' bo// rab 'byor/ 
294b1('bum): ro zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor reg zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor chos zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
294b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes
294b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
294b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab dgo// rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ 
294b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha ro/ la tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
294b6('bum): zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa zab
294b7('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
294b8('bum): zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byoran/ 
295a1('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba zab pa'i/ 
295a2('bum): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te/ 
295a3('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
295a4('bum): zab bo// rab 'byor sa'i khams zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor chu'i khams zab pa'i phyir/ shes
295a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor me'i khams za ba pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rlung gi khams zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha ro/ 
295a6('bum): tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor na mkha'i khams zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
295a7('bum): zab bo// rab 'byor ma rig pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor 'du byed zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor/ 
295a8('bum): rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor ming dang gzugs zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor skye
295b1('bum): mched drug zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor reg pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ 
295b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor sred pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor len pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
295b3('bum): tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor srid pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor skye ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// 
295b4('bum): rab 'byor rga shi zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
295b5('bum): zab bo// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab
295b6('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor
295b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
295b8('bum): byin pa zab bo// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
296a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor stong pa nyid
296a2('bum): stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor don/ 
296a3('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor
296a4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor mtha' las 'dus pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
296a5('bum): tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa zab bo// rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zab
296a6('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid
296a7('bum): zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor mi dmigs pa
296a8('bum): stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor ngo bo nyid
296b1('bum): stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang bo// rab 'byor dran
296b2('bum): ba nye bar gzhag pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul/ 
296b3('bum): gyis rkang pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor dbang po zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor stobs zab pa'i phyir
296b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin zab bo// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan
296b5('bum): lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden bza ba pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// 
296b6('bum): rab 'byor bsam gtan zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor tshad med pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin zab bo// rab 'byor
296b7('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// 
296b8('bum): rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
297a1('bum): smon pa med pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor mngon par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
297a2('bum): zab bo// rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// 
297a3('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zag
297a4('bum): rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab la 'byor byams pa chen po zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
297a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor snying rje chen po zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za bo// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
297a6('bum): brgyad zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor thams cad shes pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam
297a7('bum): pa shes pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// gsol
297a8('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'i phung po ste/ chos rin po che'i phung po rnams sgrub pa'o// 'di lta ste dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam sgrub pa'o// bsam
297b1('bum): gtan bzhi sgrub pa'o// tshad med pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// mngon par shes pa lnga sgrub pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgrub/ 
297b2('bum): pa'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgrub pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// dbang po lnga sgrub pa'o// stobs lnga sgrub pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgrub pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam
297b3('bum): yan lag brgyad pa sgrub pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad sgrub pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgrub pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i
297b4('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgrub pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams sgrub pa'o// gzung das kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
297b5('bum): sgrub pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// byams pa chen po sgrub pa'o// snying rje chen po sgrub pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
297b6('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad sgrub pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub
297b7('bum): pa'o// rang byang chub sgrub pa'o// thams cad shes pa nyid sgrub pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid sgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab
297b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs dag pa dang / tshor ba dag pa dang / 'du shes dag pa dang / 'du byed dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / 
298a1('bum): mig dag pa dang / rna bdag pa dang / sna dag pa dang / lce dag pa dang / lus dag pa dang / yid dag pa dang / gzugs dag pa dang / sgra dag pa dang / dri dag pa dang / ro dang pa dang / reg dag
298a2('bum): pa dang / chos dag pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / lus kyi rnam par
298a3('bum): shes pa dag pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dag
298a4('bum): pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
298a5('bum): gyis tshor ba dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi sa tshor ba dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi
298a6('bum): tsher ba dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bdag pa dang / sa'i khams dag pa dang / chu'i khams dag pa dang / me'i khams dag pa dang / rlung gi khams dag pa dang / nam
298a7('bum): khams dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dag pa dang / ma rig pa dag pa dang / 'du byed dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / ming dang gzugs dag pa dang / skye mched drug
298a8('bum): dag pa dang / reg pa dag pa dang / tshor ba dag pa dang / sred pa dag pa dang / len pa dag pa dang / srid pa dag pa dang / skye ba dag pa dang / rga shi dag pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa
298b1('bum): dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / shes
298b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dag pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dag pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dag pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid dag pa dang / don
298b3('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dag pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dag pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dag
298b4('bum): pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / rang bzhin sto/ dpa nyid dag pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dag pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / mi dmigs
298b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
298b6('bum): dag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dag pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dag pa dang / dbang po dag pa dang / stobs dag pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag/ 
298b7('bum): brgyad pa dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan dag pa dang / tshad med pa dag pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa dag pa/ 
298b8('bum): dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa dag pa dang / 
299a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin dag pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dag pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dag/ 
299a2('bum): pa dang / byams po chen po dag pa dang / snying rje chen po dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dag pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
299a3('bum): nyid dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dag pa'i phung po'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo de lta bu bstan
299a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ bar chad mang du mi 'byung ba ni/ ngo mtshar che'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor// de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
299a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bar chad mang po 'byung ste/ de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / 
299a6('bum): bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / bsgom par bya ba la bar chad du mi 'gyur bar bri na yang myur du bri bar bya'o// klag na yang myur du bklag go/ bstan na yang myur du bstan to// 
299a7('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la bya na yang myur du tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// bsgom na yang myur du bsgomo// rab 'byor de bas na gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
299a8('bum): zab mo 'di zla ba gcig gi bri bar bya na yang des de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// gal te zla ba gnyis sam/ gal te zla ba gsum 'am/ gal te zla ba bzhi 'am/ gal te zla ba lnga 'am/ gal te zla ba drug gam/ 
299b1('bum): gal te lo'i bar gyis bri bar bya na yang de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// gal te zla ba gcig gis bstan pa dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / bsgom pa
299b2('bum): bya na yang de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o// gal te lo'i bar gyis bsgom par bya na yang de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni nor bu rin po che chen po la bar chad
299b3('bum): mang du 'byung ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ci nas kyang mi bri ba dang / mi bklag pa dang / mi bstan pa dang / kha ton mi bgyi ba dang / yid/ 
299b4('bum): la mi bgyid pa dang / mi sgom pa'i slad du bdud sdig to ca ngan dag bar chad mi bgyid pa ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi
299b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ci nas kyang mi bro ba dang / mi klag pa dang / mi bstan pa dang / kha ton mi bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya ba dang / mi sgom pa'i phyir
299b6('bum): bdud sdig to can bar chad mi byed pa yang ma yin mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa
299b7('bum): dang / sgom pa rnams la bar chad bya bar mi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i mthus na/ byang chub
299b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / kha ton du bgyi ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / sgom pa la bdud
300a1('bum): sdig to can bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
300a2('bum): poshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa dag la bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad// 
300a3('bum): bya bar mi nus so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston
300a4('bum): pa de dag gi mthus kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sem das dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha
300a5('bum): ton tu byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgo ma pa de dag la bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar mi nu so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang / byang chub
300a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la dgongs shing yongs su 'dzin pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis yongs su bzungs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
300a7('bum): chen po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton tu byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa de dag la bdud sdig to can gyis
300a8('bum): bar chad bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyis yongasu zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba chos yongasu brtsal ba
300b1('bum): bdud sdug to can gyis bar chad mi nus so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni/ gang de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med bya dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
300b2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med bya bzhug shing 'tshe skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba la/ 
300b3('bum): dgongs pa mdzad pa dang / klog cing ston pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa la dgongs pa mdzad pa ni chos nyid kyi de bzhin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs
300b4('bum): kyi bu mos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing tshul bzhin du yid dal byed pa dang / sgom pa des kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi ma
300b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o// klon/ go/ ston te// kha ton tu byed do// tshul bzhin du yi la byed do// skem mo zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o// 
300b6('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton tu bgyid pa
300b7('bum): dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / sgom mo 'tshal kun kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/ kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi gzungs lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
300b8('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog
301a1('bum): pa dang / ston cing kha don tu byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing sgom pa de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin pang rig par bya'o// de thams cad kyang sangs
301a2('bum): kyi gzungs yin par rig par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dra zhing klog pa dang / ston cing kha ton tu bgyid pa/ 
301a3('bum): dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing sgom pa de ni/ shar phyogs nas phyogs bcu kun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad dang
301a4('bum): grangs ma mchis pa bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag gis mkhyen te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing kha ton du/ 
301a5('bum): bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing sgom pa de ngag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzig so// thugasu chud do// bcom ldan
301a6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing kha ton
301a7('bum): tu byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing sgom pa de dag ni/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i
301a8('bum): phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa grangs med pa de dag
301b1('bum): gis mkhyen to// sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs shing thug su chung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' ba'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha
301b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa de dag
301b3('bum): gis kyang 'di ltar bdag cag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur to// zhes bya bar rig par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
301b4('bum): pa'i rigs kyi'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba zab mo 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa
301b5('bum): mang bar 'gyur te/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug/ pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal ma
301b6('bum): dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed do// de ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bris shing 'chang ba de dag kyang don che ba dang / legs
301b7('bum): pache ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / rnam par smin pa che bar 'gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongasu non gyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba des
301b8('bum): nam yang ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyuraro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang
302a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur/ 
302a2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyuraro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam
302a3('bum): yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// nang stong
302a4('bum): pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyuraro// phyi stong pa nyid da dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyuraro// stong pa nyid stong pa
302a5('bum): nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong / pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// 'dus byas
302a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// thog
302a7('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyuraro// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// chos
302a8('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyuraro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur
302b1('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyuraro// dngos po med pa'i ngo thon stong banyid napa yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// dran
302b2('bum): ba nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi
302b3('bum): 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// stobs rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang nam yang bral bar 'gyur// 
302b4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang nam yang bral b.rami 'gyuraro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams dang nam yang
302b5('bum): bral bar mi 'gyur// tshad med pa rnams dang nam yang bra/ la bar mi 'gyur ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa/ ra 'jug pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// 
302b6('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
302b7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi
302b8('bum): 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang nam yang bral bar
303a1('bum): mi 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
303a2('bum): pa bco brgyad dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyuraro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa 'das nas/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/ de na byang chub sems/ 
303a3('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag mos pa dam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur// 
303a4('bum): 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par// 'gyur te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang byug pa dang / 
303a5('bum): phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mchi na dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed par 'gyur ro// de dag dge ba'i
303a6('bum): rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song du log par ltung bar mi 'dong ste/ de dag gis lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyuraro// de dag
303a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par byed cing nyan thos
303a8('bum): kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyuraro// shar
303b1('bum): tra'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bza' ma 'ang blo phyogs kyi rgyud nas yul bar rtanan spyod par 'gyur te/ den yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma / 
303b2('bum): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ngag mos pa dam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun
303b3('bum): chub par byed par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / 
303b4('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/ bkur sti byed/ phu dud byed/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log
303b5('bum): par ltung bar mi 'dong ste/ de dag gis lha dang / mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro// de dag
303b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa
303b7('bum): byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim
303b8('bum): gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yul bar rta ni nas byang phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/ de na yang
304a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag mos pa dam pas shes rab tu
304a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la
304a3('bum): byed par 'gyur te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/ 
304a4('bum): bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed par ra 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar mi 'dong ste/ de dag gis lha dang mi'i
304a5('bum): phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro// de dag pa/ rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags
304a6('bum): par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg/ 
304a7('bum): pa'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar shes rab tu
304a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rgyud dang / byang phyogs kyi rgyud na phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya tha ma la sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
304b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa
304b2('bum): dgongs pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos dang 'dul ba dang la bab pa'i tshe/ dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur te/ chos de yang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
304b3('bum): pa 'di'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed
304b4('bum): pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa de dag la ni ngas dgongs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
304b5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing bris nas kyang me tog dang / phreng ba dang spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / 
304b6('bum): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dung du byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de
304b7('bum): dag kyang ngas dgongs te/ sha radwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar mi 'dong ste/ de dag lha dang / 
304b8('bum): mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro// de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par
305a1('bum): gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang mchod pa byed cing nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs
305a2('bum): rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir
305a3('bum): zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzig so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs
305a4('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas brjod do// da/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi dbu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstod do// bsngags
305a5('bum): so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shar phyogs kyi de bzhi na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
305a6('bum): sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzig go// 
305a7('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do bstod do bsngags so// rigs kyi
305a8('bum): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs zhing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston
305b1('bum): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin
305b2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do bstod ngo bsngags so// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs
305b3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
305b4('bum): gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin pa/ shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
305b5('bum): rgyas de dag gis brjod do// bstod do bsngag so// / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
305b6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzugs shing 'chi slong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kya
305b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag nod bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
305b8('bum): de dag gos brjod do// bstang // bsngags so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bum de dag ni byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams cad bzhin gshegs pa
306a1('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
306a2('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs
306a3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do// bstod do// bsngags so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shar
306a4('bum): lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco dam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i
306a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang / 
306a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do// bstod do// bsngags so// rigs
306a7('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tshe
