306a8('bum): skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// 
306b1('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do// bstod / 
306b2('bum): bsngags so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
306b3('bum): sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang
306b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyis spun gyis gzigs so// da rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
306b5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do// bstod do// bsngags rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
306b6('bum): 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
306b7('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin
306b8('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do// bstod do// bsngags so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de
307a1('bum): ngag ni steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba dang / 
307a2('bum): chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
307a3('bum): bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do// bstod do// bsngags so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
307a4('bum): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na byang phyogasu rgyas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu
307a5('bum): de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma 'tshe byang phyogasu rgyas par 'gyur te/ de la sha ra dwa bya/ 
307a6('bum): phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ro// 
307a7('bum): mos par byas nas kyang 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed
307a8('bum): par 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing thos nas mos par byed pa dang / 
307b1('bum): mos par byas nas 'dri zhing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa
307b2('bum): de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas mong po la bsnyen bkur pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yongs su bzung ba dang / 
307b3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na byang gi phyogs cha der byang chub sems dpa'i theg
307b4('bum): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang she/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing thos nas mos par bgyid pa dang / mos par bgyid
307b5('bum): nas 'dri zhing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing tshul bzhin/ du yid la bgyis pa dang / de bzhin du nan tan du
307b6('bum): bgyid pa de lta bu ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na byang gi phyogs cha der byang chub sems
307b7('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo ni mang du 'byung ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi
307b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ mi 'dzum yongasu mi 'jum mi 'jigs mi dang skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni mang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs
308a1('bum): bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po'i rjesu 'brangs pa dang / rigs
308a2('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po la yongasu zhus yongasu dris pa'i phyir te/ de yang
308a3('bum): ci'i phyin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
308a4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
308a5('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rig sa kyi bu mo de dag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin payongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang
308a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzog
308a7('bum): par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nang stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyi stong pa nyid yongasu
308a8('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu me de dag ni stong pa zhid/ 
308b1('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni chen po stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi/ 
308b2('bum): mo de dag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs
308b3('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
308b4('bum): yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs
308b5('bum): kyi thu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigasakyai ba dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rang bzhin stong
308b6('bum): banyid yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / 
308b7('bum): rigs bu mo de dag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs
308b8('bum): par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang // rigs kyi rdum de dag ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi/ 
309a1('bum): mo de dag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dngos po
309a2('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
309a3('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
309a4('bum): pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dbang po yod sa su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang // 
309a5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni stobs yongasu rdzogs par 'gyurar ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag yongasu rdzogs par
309a6('bum): 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
309a7('bum): mo de dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam gtan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
309a8('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni tshad med pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms
309b1('bum): bar 'jug pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu ma de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / 
309b2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rnam par thar
309b3('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mngon
309b4('bum): par shes pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni ting nge/ 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs
309b5('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzungs kyi na yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshes
309b6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / 
309b7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byams pa chen po yongasu rdzogs par
309b8('bum): 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni snying rje chen po yong su rdzogs par 'gyur/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bce brgyad yongasu dag par 'gyur/ 
310a1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ma dag ni dge ba'i rtsabs nye bar bstan par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par/ 
310a2('bum): byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de ni 'di ltar sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni ngas rnam pa thams cad
310a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod do// 'das pa'i 'dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas
310a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod de/ de dag tshe 'das nas kyang / 
310a5('bum): 'di lta ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de dag ga/ zhen la yang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par
310a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du rnam pa de lta bu nyid brjod par 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur te/ de
310a7('bum): dag ni bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bzlogs par mi nus na/ sdig to la mos pa dang / sdig
310a8('bum): to'i spyod pa can shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spong ba gzhan gyis lta ci smos sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
310b1('bum): modo dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas dga' zhing nyams bde ba rgya chen po skye bar 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
310b2('bum): don du skye bo mang po yang dge ba'i chos la 'god par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni nga'i mdun du 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag byang chub
310b3('bum): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ srogs chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrags mang po byang chub tu rab tu
310b4('bum): dgod par bgyi'o// yang dag par bstan par bgyi 'o// yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o// yang dag par gzeng bstod par bgyi'o// yang dag par
310b5('bum): dga' bar bgyi'o// phyir mi ldogs par lung bstan/ par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smra so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
310b6('bum): kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig ni sems la sems kyi rnam par blta ste/ ngas rjesu dgyes pa mdzad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
310b7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'di skad du bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ srogs
310b8('bum): chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srogs chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu dgod par bgyi'o// yang dag par bstan
311a1('bum): par bgyi'o// yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o// yang dag par gzeng bsod par bgyi'o// yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o// 
311a2('bum): phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de
311a3('bum): dag gis kyang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig ni sems la thugs kyis rnam par gzigs te rjes su dgyes pa mdzad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
311a4('bum): mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sro bag chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srogs chags s+ho/ nga phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po
311a5('bum): blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'god par/ 'gyur ro// yang dag par bstan par 'gyur/ yang dag par bskul bar 'gyur// yang dag par
311a6('bum): gzeng bstod par 'gyur/ yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyu ro// phyir mi ldog par lung ston par 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mod dag ni gzugs
311a7('bum): dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la mos pa rlabs po cher 'gyur te/ de dag sbyin pa brlabs po che gtong bar 'gyur ro// sbyin ba rlabs po che gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che
311a8('bum): mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro// de dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs chen po mngon par 'dus byas nas rnam par smin pa rlabs po che yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ de dag rnam par smin pa
311b1('bum): rlabs chen po yongs su gzung nas sems can de dag nyid kyi don du rnam par smin pa rlabs chen po las de bas kyang ches rlabs che ba'i rnam par smin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'di/ 
311b2('bum): ltar phyi 'am nang gi dngos po de dag kyang sems can de dag nyid la yongasu gtong bar 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
311b3('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing mtsho skyong ba dang / 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid kyi chos ston pa mngon du gyur pa de lta bu'i sangs
311b4('bum): rgyas kyi zhing dag la brten par 'gyur ro// de dag gis de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs dpa'i sangs rgyas de rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
311b5('bum): zab mo mngon sum du thos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu yang / srogs chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srogs chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag
311b6('bum): mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro// yang dag par bskul bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par gzeng bstod par 'gyur ro// 
311b7('bum): yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa
311b8('bum): dang da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams las chos gang thugasu ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchiso// de bzhin nyid dang chos nyid gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// sems/ 
312a1('bum): can rnams kyi sems thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis pa ni ngo mtshar che ste/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs
312a2('bum): su mkhyen to// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang yongasu mkhyen to// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongasu mkhyen
312a3('bum): to// ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongasu mkhyen to// ma byor pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan thos
312a4('bum): rnams kyang yongasu mkhyen to// da ltar byung ba'i de ba bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan tho sa rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to// phyogs bcu'i
312a5('bum): 'jig rten gyis khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig/ bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs
312a6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongasu mkhyen to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to// 
312a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi slad du/ su brtson par bgyid cing pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag tshol ba dang
312a8('bum): yongasu tshol ba'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag tshol ba dang yongs su tshol ba las la las ni brtsal ba las pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thob par
312b1('bum): 'gyur/ la las ni thob par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni de ltar ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo brtson 'grus mi/ 
312b2('bum): gtong ba de dag kun gyis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
312b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drag po 'di dag gi don du brtson par byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo
312b4('bum): zab mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag kun kyang 'grub par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba dka' stsal pa/ shar dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / 
312b5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag mi 'grub par 'gyur/ ba de lta bu gnas med sa pas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
312b6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can rnams yang dag par ston cing yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dang / 
312b7('bum): 'god cing rab tu gzhog pa las kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'das nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'grub par 'gyur ro// 
312b8('bum): de dag ni nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par ma byas/ sems can yongasu smin par ma byas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
313a1('bum): par ma gyur gyi bar du/ ji skad du bstan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug pod dag las brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
313a2('bum): stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum cu gcig go// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyis brgya drug pa/ de nas tshe
313a3('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
313a4('bum): chub tu zhugs pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu 'dzin pa de dag gi yon tan
313a5('bum): yongs su brjod pa ni 'di dag lags na/ bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa de dag bar chad
313a6('bum): du 'gyur ba ji lta bu dag mchis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor spobs pa ha cang phyi ste skye na/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
313a7('bum): pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du spobs pa ha cang phyi ste skye bar 'gyur/ de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
313a8('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
313b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar loyong su rdzogs par byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ brtson 'grus
313b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yong su rdzogs par byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs
313b3('bum): su rdzogs par byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' ba yong su rdzogs par byed na/ rab 'byor rnams grangs des shin tu 'phyi ste spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro// de ni byang
313b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye na/ byang chub sems
313b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rigs par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dasaci'i slad du shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye bar 'gyur
313b6('bum): de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rigs par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
313b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
313b8('bum): dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
314a1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas ha cang myur bar spobs pa skye la des rloms sems su byed na/ rab 'byor rnams grangs des na spobs pa ha cang myur bar skye
314a2('bum): ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rigs par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang glal cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri na/ rab 'byor
314a3('bum): de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rigs par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang dgod cing 'dri na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa'
314a4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyil su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor phan tshun steg cing 'dri na/ rab 'byo/ dar de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
314a5('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// sems g.yeng zhing dri na rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// 
314a6('bum): yi ge gzhan la chags shing tshig gi don mi shes par 'drin rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// 'di'i ro ma myong nas
314a7('bum): stan las langs te 'gro na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang glal cing lung 'bog na/ 
314a8('bum): rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// glal cing kha ton byed dam 'dzin tam klog gam ston pa dang / glal cing tshul
314b1('bum): bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyil su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang phan tshun dgod cing 'dzin tam
314b2('bum): 'chang ngam klog gam kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// 
314b3('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang phan tshun steg cing 'dzin tam 'chang ngam klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa'
314b4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang sems g.yeng bas 'dzin tam 'chang ngam klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam tshul
314b5('bum): bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang yi ge gzhan
314b6('bum): dang gzhan la chags shing 'dzin tam 'chang ngam klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
314b7('bum): chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
314b8('bum): kyis gang 'di skad du 'di'i ro ma myong nas stan las langs te 'gro na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// zhes bka'
315a1('bum): stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di'i ro mi myong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byung
315a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
315a3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma sprad pa de dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 
315a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las bdag cag lung ma bste/ na to zhes ma dad pa'i yid kyis bstan las langs shing 'dong ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
315a5('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gso// la pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las lung ma bstan par de dag bstan
315a6('bum): las langs shing mchi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med par ma chud pa ni/ 
315a7('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan te/ de la bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las mi 'byung ngo // bdag gi ming yang ma brjod do zhes dad par
315a8('bum): ma gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol
315b1('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming yongs su ma brjod pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
315b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa rnams kyi ming ni yongs su mi brjod de/ de la bdag gi ming yang 'di las mi 'byung / bdag gang du skyes pa'i grong
315b3('bum): ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal gyi ming 'di yang mi 'byung ngo zhes de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyan to snyam byed cing 'khor de nas 'gro bar sems na/ sems bskyed
315b4('bum): des ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar sems shing gom pa ji snyed cig/ dbor bde snyed kyi bskal pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ de dag la bzod pa brtson par bya dgos
315b5('bum): so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing mdo sde gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye she sa yongs su mi sgrub pa de dag/ kun chub par bya bar
315b6('bum): sems te/ des na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing gi rtsa ba spangs te/ de nyid kyi yal ga dang
315b7('bum): 'dab ma dang lo ma la 'ju bar sems par gyur pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ 
315b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'i mdo sde kun chub par bgyi bar sems par 'gyur pa de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
316a1('bum): bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde gang nyan thos dang ldan pa'am rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag ste/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang
316a2('bum): dag par spongs pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
316a3('bum): dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag rgyun du zhugs
316a4('bum): pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bru/ ras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang / rang byang chub thob par
316a5('bum): 'gyur gyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub 'thob par mi 'gyur ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
316a6('bum): mdo sde gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing kun chub par bya bar sems pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'o// de ci'i phyir/ 
316a7('bum): zhe na rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis 'byung
316a8('bum): pabar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
316b1('bum): chos rnams la skyob pa yin no// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste dper nA/ khyil la zhig jo ba zan nar ma bor te las mi las zan btsal bar sems dpa' dang 'dra bar de bzhin du ra
316b2('bum): 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa 'di
316b3('bum): bor te/ yal ga dang lo ma dang 'dab ma lta bu'i mdo sde nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dag la brtan par sems pa 'byung ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub
316b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
316b5('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes bkyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor nas khye dang bkur sti'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i/ 
316b6('bum): mdo sde rnams kun chub par bya bar sems pa 'byung ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di
316b7('bum): lha ste dper na mi la la zhig glang po che 'dod la des glang po che rnyed na glang po'i rjes brtsal bar sems pa yod na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de
316b8('bum): mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
317a1('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing mdo sde gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de
317a2('bum): dag btsal bar sems pa dag kyang dpe de dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// 
317a3('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na me zhig rgya mtsho chen po lta bar 'dod pa la ba lang gi rjes btsal bar sems shing / des ba lang gi rjes mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du rgya mtsho chen por
317a4('bum): tshad 'di dang mnyam mam mi mnyam snyam na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas dpa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ 
317a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bde bar ga gas pa de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'a ngas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du
317a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ma 'di
317a7('bum): bor zhing spangs te nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag gzung ba dang kun chub par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang rnam pa de ltar rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor de yang
317a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bya mkhan nam phyag mkhan gyi slob ma rnam par rgyal ba'i
317b1('bum): khang pa'i tshad du khang pa zhig dbub cing bslab par 'dod de nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang yongasu btsal bar sems shing nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang las tshang blangs par/ 
317b2('bum): sems na rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems skyes bu des nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi tshad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad dang dpe tshul bzung ste/ de dang
317b3('bum): 'dra ba'i khang pa dbub par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
317b4('bum): phyag mkhan nam phyag mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu de ni byis pa'i ngang tshul can du rig
317b5('bum): par bgyi ste/ mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can ma lags/ so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
317b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu ma la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di/ 
317b7('bum): bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor de la ji
317b8('bum): snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
318a1('bum): ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems
318a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skye bu la la zhig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod la
318a3('bum): des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong nas 'di snyam du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de kha dog dang dbyibs kyis ci 'dra ba zhig yod ces des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong ba'i kha dog dang
318a4('bum): dbyibs kyi mtshan mazung bar bsams te/ 'di skad du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang tshul dang mtshan ma yang sa'i bdag po 'di 'dra
318a5('bum): ba zhig yod grangs zhes zer na/ rab 'byor de ji sa/ ma du sems skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul/ can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
318a6('bum): 'das de ni ma lag so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i ba'i dus na/ byang chub
318a7('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing
318a8('bum): spangs te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor de la ji
318b1('bum): snyam du sems byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mod dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// 
318b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 
318b3('bum): skyes bu shin tu bkres pa la la zhig gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas rnyed kyang / drug cu pa'i kha zas btsal bar sems shing / des kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa de dor nas/ 
318b4('bum): drug bcu pa'i kha zas la bza' bar bsams na/ ra rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhadas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom
318b5('bum): ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyi/ sa bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ong dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
318b6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang rang
318b7('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems byang chub sems
318b8('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
319a1('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu/ 
319a2('bum): la la zhig gis nor bu rin po che ring thang med pa snyed nas/ nor bu mching bu dang bskrun par bsams na/ rab 'byor ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ 
319a3('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rig
319a4('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / shes rab dkyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos
319a5('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems
319a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
319a7('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang rig kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab
319a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ spobs pa mang po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i dkrugs mar 'gyur ba de lta bu skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ltar
319b1('bum): gzugs kyi spobs pa dang / sgra'i spobs pa dang / dri'i spobs pa dang / ro'i spobs pa dang / reg gi spobs pa dang / chos kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul
319b2('bum): khrims kyi spobs pa dang / bzod pa'i spobs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang / shes rab kyi spobs pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi spobs
319b3('bum): pa dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi spobs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang kha ton bya ba'i spobs pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i spobs pa dang / dran pa
319b4('bum): nye bar gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang yang dag par spong da ba'i spobs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i spobs pa dadang / dbang po'i spobs pa dang / stobs kyi spobs pa
319b5('bum): dang byang chub kyi yan lag gi spobs pa dang / lam gyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i spobs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi
319b6('bum): spobs pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i spobs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / stong pa nyid
319b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
319b8('bum): kyi spobs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rang bzhin
320a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi spobs dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / mi dmigs bsngo
320a2('bum): pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i
320a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa
320a4('bum): dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / stob ngas bcu'i spobs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 
320a5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa'i spobs pa dang / byams pa chen po'i spobs pa dang snying rje chen po'i suT/ sa pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i spobs pa/ 
320a6('bum): dang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i slob pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i spobs pa dang / 
320a7('bum): rang byang chub kyi spobs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spobs pa skyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spobs/ 
320a8('bum): pa med pas/ rnam par byang ba'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems med pa'o// rab
320b1('bum): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa'o// rab 'byor/ 
320b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrugs pa med pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brjod du med pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par byang
320b3('bum): ba med pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la med cing
320b4('bum): mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dadapa'i thegs pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe
320b5('bum): chos de dag gis 'khrug par gyur na rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bdud kyil su rig par bya'o// 
320b6('bum): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar nus sam/ 
320b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta ma yin no// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ mi dmig
320b8('bum): so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigaso// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// bzod
321a1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// 
321a2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigaso// nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod ma yin te mi dmigaso// phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi
321a3('bum): dmig so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmig so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo sa
321a4('bum): nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigaso// / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi
321a5('bum): dmig so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod/ ba ma yin te mi dmig so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigaso// 
321a6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigaso// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmig so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngos
321a7('bum): nyid yod pa ma yin te/ mi dmig so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ mi dmigaso// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin/ 
321a8('bum): te mi dmig so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmig so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigaso// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
321b1('bum): kyi ngo ba nyid yong pa ma yin te mi dmig so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigaso// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma
321b2('bum): yin te mi dmig so// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigaso// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmig so// dbang po rnams
321b3('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmig so// stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmig so// 
321b4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa dam yin te mi dmigaso// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// 
321b5('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmig sa so// tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmig so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms
321b6('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigaso// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmig so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyom par 'jug/ 
321b7('bum): pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigaso// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs// 
321b8('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo ba nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmig so// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te me dmig so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod
322a1('bum): pa ma yin te mi dmig so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmig so// mi 'jig pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod
322a2('bum): pa ma yin te mi dmigaso// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigaso// byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigaso// snying rje
322a3('bum): chen po'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigaso// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigaso// thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma
322a4('bum): yin te mi dmig so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi
322a5('bum): dmig so// ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni da ngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ dngos po med pas
322a6('bum): dngos po med pa bri bar mi nus so// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dngos po med ces bya
322a7('bum): bar 'du shes na de yang bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
322a8('bum): byiphyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bris nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bdag gis briso zhes mchi na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la/ yi ger
322b1('bum): mngon par chags pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge mA mchis pa'o// brtson
322b2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 
322b3('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'du shes ni mi ge mchis
322b4('bum): pa'o// 'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam pa ra shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mig ni maM ge ma mchis pa'o// rna ba ni yi ge mi mchis pa'o// 
322b5('bum): sna ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lce ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lus ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// yid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// gzugs ni yi ge
322b6('bum): ma mchis pa'o// sgra ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// drin yi ge ma mchis pa'o// ro ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// reg ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// chos ni yi ge ma mchis
322b7('bum): pa'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lce'i
322b8('bum): rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mig gi 'dus te/ 
323a1('bum): reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lce
323a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge mi mchis pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg
323a3('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis
323a4('bum): pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te regadape'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 
323a5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// chu'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// me'i khams
323a6('bum): ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rlung gi khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// na mkha'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 
323a7('bum): ma rig pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// ming dang gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// skye mched
323a8('bum): drug ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sred pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// len pa ni yi ge ma mchis
323b1('bum): pa'o// srid pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// skye ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rga shi ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// phyi stong pa
323b2('bum): nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 
323b3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa
323b4('bum): stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// thog ma dang tha mamed pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dor med pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rang bzhin
323b5('bum): stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rang gi ma tshan nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mi
323b6('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
323b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnam ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
323b8('bum): rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dbang po rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// stobs rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnam ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// / 
324a1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// bsam gtan
324a2('bum): rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// tshad med pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam par thar pa
324a3('bum): rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / 
324a4('bum): smon pa med pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnam
324a5('bum): ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stob/ sa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mi 'jig sa pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa
324a6('bum): rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// byams pa chen po ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// snying rje chen po na yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis
324a7('bum): pa'o// thams cad shes pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lam gyi rnams pa shes pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 
324a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyis bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo yi ge ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid la
324b1('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par
324b2('bum): bgyid pa dang yi ge ma mchis pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags
324b3('bum): par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par
324b4('bum): bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi dge ma mchis pa'i phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par
324b5('bum): bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma/ mchis pa'i chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags
324b6('bum): par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par ma chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags
324b7('bum): par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon
324b8('bum): par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dor ba med pa stong
325a1('bum): pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yig/ 
325a2('bum): ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis
325a3('bum): pa'i mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma
325a4('bum): mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags
325a5('bum): par bgyid pa dang yi ge ma mchis pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhags pa rnams la mngon par chags pa ra bgyid pa dang yi ge ma mchis pa'i yang dag
325a6('bum): par spongs pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i
325a7('bum): dbang po rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag
325a8('bum): rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i
325b1('bum): bden pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshad med pa
325b2('bum): rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis
325b3('bum): pa'i rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang // 
325b4('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i
325b5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags par ba gyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzi/ na rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / 
325b6('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang // 
325b7('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang
325b8('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i snying rje chen po la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang
326a1('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la
326a2('bum): mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa de yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
326a3('bum): chen pos bdud kyi la su rigs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
326a4('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri da ba dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 
326a5('bum): 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa 'i tshe/ yul gyi yid la bya ba mang po skyed na/ rab 'byor/ 
326a6('bum): de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyil su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
326a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid
326a8('bum): la byed pa dang sgom pa'i tshe/ grong gi yid la bya ba dang / grong rdal gyi yid la bya ba dang / khams kyi yid la bya ba dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi yid la bya ba dang
326b1('bum): khyam gyis yid la bya ba dang bla ma dang mkhan po yid la bya ba dang / ma dang ldan pa yid la bya ba dang / pha dang ldan pa yid la bya ba dang / phu nu dang ldan pa yid la bya ba dang / 
326b2('bum): sring mo dang ldan pa yid la bya ba dang / gnyen bshes dang ldan pa yid la bya ba dang / rkun po dang ldan pa yid la bya ba dang / phyag dar ba dang ldan pa yid la bya ba dang / 'jig
326b3('bum): rten pa dang ldan pa yid la bya ba dang / sprul 'tsheng ma dang ldan pa yid la bya ba dang / bud med dang ldan pa yid la bya ba dang / yid la bya ba gzhan mang po sbyin/ rab 'byor
326b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dra ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed
326b5('bum): pa'i tshe/ bar chad bya ba'i phyir bdud sdig to can khru ga par 'gyur ba nye bar sbyor te/ de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su
326b6('bum): rigs par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ 9
326b7('bum): dang bkur bsti dang / tshigasu bcad pa dang / chos gos dang / zas dang mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang po byung la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
326b8('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe// 
327a1('bum): de dag gi ro myong bar byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyil su rig par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha
327a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ bar chad de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
327a3('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed
327a4('bum): pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa'i tshe// bdud sdig to can dag/ mdo sde zab mo gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam
327a5('bum): dang yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs// rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 
327a6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag nye bar bsnyen par byed de/ de la byang chub sems
327a7('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo thabs mkhas pas bdud kyi bsnyen pa'i mdo sde zab mo zab mo de dag la 'dod pa mi bskyed do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
327a8('bum): dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs mi mkhas pa dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
327b1('bum): thos nas/ spong bar sems te/ de la ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la thabs mkhas pa yang rgya cher bstan te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
327b2('bum): 'di las kyang thabs mkhas pa rgya cher btsal bar bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
327b3('bum): 'di bor zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/ thabs mkhas pa btsal bar sems pa yod na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
327b4('bum): dpa' chen pos bdud kyil su rig par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/  le'u sum cu gnyis// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu
327b5('bum): phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// / bam nyis brgya bdun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nya na pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang / 
327b6('bum): lung 'jog pa dang / kha ton bya bar dga' la/ chos smra ba ni phyi shol byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab
327b7('bum): 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya bar phyi shol mi byed la/ chos nyan pa ni yul gzhan du 'gro na/ 
327b8('bum): rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang / chos nyan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri ba dang / 
328a1('bum): lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni yul gzhan du 'gro na rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
328a2('bum): bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos spa ni khe dang / bkur bsti dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhur len cing gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen
328a3('bum): rtsi dang / yo byad lhur len la/ chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes la/ rab tu dben zhing brtson 'grus brtsam pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/ mi g.yeng ba/ sems rtse
328a4('bum): gcig tu 'dus pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa zhig ste/ khe dang / bkur stis 'jigs na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung
328a5('bum): 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
328a6('bum): gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/ 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes la/ rab tu dben zhing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/ mi g.yeng ba/ sems rtse gcig tu
328a7('bum): 'dus pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa zhig ste/ khe dang / bkur stis 'jigs la chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa che zhing / sdig to 'dod la/ khe dang bskur sti dang / tshig su bcad pa lhur
328a8('bum): len cing / gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad lhur len na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung
328b1('bum): 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan
328b2('bum): yang chos smra ba ni dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod pa/ zas phyis mi len pa/ stan gcig pa/ ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa/ dur khrod pa/ 
328b3('bum): bla gab med pa shing drung pa/ cog pu pa/ bzhi ji bzhin pa chos gos gsum par gyur la/ chos nyan pa ni dgon pa pa ma yin/ bsod snyoms pa ma yin/ phyag
328b4('bum): dur khrod pa ma yin/ zas phyis mi len pa ma yin/ bstan gcig pa ma yin/ ci thob pa'i bsod na/ rams len pa ma yin/ dur khrod pa ma yin/ bla ga ba
328b5('bum): med pa ma yin/ shing drung pa ma yin/ cog pu pa ma yi// na/ gzhi ji bzhin pa ma yin/ chos gos gsu/ ma pa ma yin/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
328b6('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par
328b7('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni dgon pa pa bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod pa zas phyis mi len pa/ stan gcig pa/ zas ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms
328b8('bum): len pa/ dur khrod pa/ bla gab med pa/ shing drung pa/ cog pu pa/ gzhi ji bzhin pa/ chos gos gsum par gyur la/ chos smra ba ni dgon pa pa ma yin/ bsod/ 
329a1('bum): snyom pa ma yin/ phyag dar khrod pa ma yin/ zas phyis mi len pa ma yin/ stan gcig pa ma yin/ ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa ma yin
329a2('bum): dur khrod pa ma yin/ bla gab med pa ma yin/ shing drung pa ma yin/ cog pu pa ma yin/ gzhi ji bzhin pa/ chos gos gsum pa ma yin na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi
329a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig
329a4('bum): par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni dad cing bsam pa dge la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri bar 'dod/ lung 'bog par 'dod/ kha
329a5('bum): ton byed par 'dod la/ chos smra ba mi dad pa/ tshul khri/ mas ngan pa/ sdig pa'i chos can zhig ste/ na sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri bar mi 'dod/ lung
329a6('bum): 'bog par mi 'dod/ kha ton byed par mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ 
329a7('bum): rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyil su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni dad cing bsam pa dge la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
329a8('bum): bzab mo 'di bri bar 'did/ lung 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton byed par 'dod// chos nyan pa ni ma dang na rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba
329b1('bum): dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyil su rigs par bya'o// ra/ 
329b2('bum): 'byor gzhan yang smra ba ni/ bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong zhing / sems la chags pa med la chos nyan pa ni ser sna can chags pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'jungs par gyur na/ 
329b3('bum): rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa'
329b4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni/ bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong zhing sems la chags pa med la/ 
329b5('bum): chos smra ba ni ser sna can chags pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / 'jungs par gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang she/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang
329b6('bum): lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab
329b7('bum): 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni/ chos smra ba la/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad yongasu gtong bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni
329b8('bum): len par mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ 
330a1('bum): de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyil su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni glengs
330a2('bum): pa tsam gyis shes la/ chos nyan pa ni bkri dgos shing tshig lhur len par gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog
330a3('bum): pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan
330a4('bum): yang chos nyan pa ni glengs pa tsam gyis shes la chos smra ba ni bkra dgos shing tshigs lhur len par gyu dar na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
330a5('bum): pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'a/ ra de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
330a6('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yong chos smra ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyi bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshog su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa
330a7('bum): dang / gleng bzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rab dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab par
330a8('bum): bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la/ chos nyan pa ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyi bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigasu bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / 
330b1('bum): gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa bstan /

330b3('bum): 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyam ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan
330b4('bum): pa dang / tshig su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa da dang / gling gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang
330b5('bum): chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtog pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab par bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par shes la chos smra ba ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa
330b6('bum): dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigasu bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / 
330b7('bum): chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab par bstan pa'i chos kyi khyad par mi shes na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri
330b8('bum): ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// 
331a1('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan la/ chos nyan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang mi ldan na/ rab 'byor de yang / 
331a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
331a3('bum): chen pos/ bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan la chos smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang mi ldan na// rab 'byor
331a4('bum): de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dmi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa'
331a5('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// // rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la thabs mkhas la/ chos nyan pa ni pha
331a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa drug la thabs mi mkhas na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/

331a8('bum): chos smra ba ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la thabs mi mkhas na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i/ 
331b1('bum): rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gzungs thob par gyur
331b2('bum): la chos nyan pa ni gzungs mthong na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa
331b3('bum): ste rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gzungs thob par gyur la/

331b6('bum): 'dod/ lung 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton bya bar 'dod/ bsgom par 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni bri bA mi 'dod/ bklag par mi 'dod/ lung 'bog par mi 'dong / 
331b7('bum): kha ton bya bar mi 'dod// mnyan par mi 'dod/ bsgom par mi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang /

332a1('bum): bar 'dod/ bklag par 'dod/ lung 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton bya bar 'dod/ mnyan par 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni bri bar mi 'dod/

332a4('bum): gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'dod sred pa dang bral/ gnod sem/ sa dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa// dang bral/ the tsom dang bral la/ chos nyan pa ni 'dod
332a5('bum): pa'i sred pa dang bcas/ gnod sems dang / snyoms pa da nga / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang bcas/ the tsom de nga bcas par gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha

332b1('bum): tu phyin pa zang mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'jog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las rig/

332b3('bum): du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ la la zhig der 'ongs te/ sems can dmyal ba'i mi snyan brjod/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul gyi
332b4('bum): mi snyan brjod cing / sems can dmyal ba ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo// byol seng gi skye gnas ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo// yi dgas kyi yul ni 'di ltar sdug
332b5('bum): bsngal// khyod kyis sdug bsngal 'di nyid du mthar phyin/ par gyis shig/ gang la sdug bsngal stong phragamang po nyam su myong bar 'gyur ba'i bla na med pa
332b6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya/ khyod yun ring por 'khor bar gyur ta ri zhes zer na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / 
332b7('bum): lung 'dog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen ma ldan mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rag
332b8('bum): 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'chad pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed
333a1('bum): pa'i tshe ga la la zhig der 'ong te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod cing / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod
333a2('bum): mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi leg/ 
333a3('bum): pa brjod/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjed tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshangs chen
333a4('bum): gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyi leg sa pa brjod/ chu snang gi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ 
333a5('bum): kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ dge ba'i lha/ rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ chung dge'i lha/ rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams
333a6('bum): kyi legs pa brjodadage rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod chung che'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyi
333a7('bum): legs pa brjod/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi leg pa brjod/ mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjodami gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ shin tu mthong ba'i
333a8('bum): lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi
333b1('bum): legs pa brjod/ rnams shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ chung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod/ 'du shes med 'du shes
333b2('bum): med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod cing / 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pas 'di ltar bde'o// gzugs kyi khams ni bsam gtan dang
333b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis 'di ltar bde'o// gzugs med pa'i khams ni snyoms par 'jug pa zhi ba rnams kyis 'di ltar bde ste/ de dag kyang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal
333b4('bum): bag med do// rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can/ zad pa de'i chos can 'jig rten pa'i chos can skye ba'i chos can/ 'phags pa'i chos can yon gyis// 
333b5('bum): khyod kyis 'di nyid du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyis shig/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bud / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa
333b6('bum): nyid thob par gyis shig/ 'di nyid du rang byang chub thob par gyis shig/ phyin chad 'khor ba na mi 'khor bar gyis shig/ ces zer na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol
333b7('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi la su rig
333b8('bum): bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste/ zla med cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos nyan pa ni 'khor gyi nang na gnas na/ rab 'byor de yang shes
334a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen mi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems
334a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bdud kyi lasu rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gcig pu ste/ zla med cing bdag gis byed pa ma yin la/ chos smra ba ni/
